description_en:
1. OVERVIEW

Your privacy is very important to Hamad International Airport (“HIA”) and we understand how important it is to you. We want you to feel safe when visiting our websites or using our services and are committed to maintaining your privacy when you do. We require our employees, suppliers and partners to maintain confidentiality in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

This Privacy Notice (“Privacy Notice”) (together with our Cookie Policy and any other documents referred to herein) sets out the basis on which we collect Personal Data from you, or that you provide to us. Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your Personal Data. 

This Privacy Notice can be changed over time to comply with law or to meet our changing business requirements. The most up-to-date Privacy Notice can be found on our website.

2. DEFINITIONS

 By "Personal Data" we mean any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.  
 

3. WHEN DOES THIS PRIVACY NOTICE APPLY?
 

This Privacy Notice applies to the processing by HIA of all Personal Data we gather when you use our website, www.dohahamadairport.com ("Website"), our mobile application ("Mobile App") services provided by us or others acting on our behalf and when you interact with us. We will only use your Personal Data in accordance with this Privacy Notice.

 

4. WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR PERSONAL DATA? 
 

4.1 Qatar Company for Airports Operation and Management W.L.L., a Qatari company organised and existing under the laws of the State of Qatar with its registered office at Qatar Airways Tower, PO Box 22550, Doha, and State of Qatar (“HIA”, the “Airport”, “we”, or “us”). is responsible, as controller, for the collection and use of all Personal Data described in this Privacy Notice.


4.2 Please be aware however that our Website may contain links to enable you to visit third-party websites, mobile sites and mobile applications for your convenience and information. Please note that these are governed by their own privacy policies and not this Privacy Notice and that we do not have any control over these and are not responsible for the protection and privacy of any information that you provide whilst visiting such sites.

5. HOW WE COLLECT AND RECEIVE PERSONAL DATA

5.1 We may collect and receive Personal Data directly from you or from your authorised representatives or from third parties, including when you:

(a)     communicate with us such as by email, telephone, in writing or through our customer services pages or social media platforms; or

(b)     use the Airport or any facilities and services (including Wi-Fi, Website, Mobile App) within the Airport.

5.2 Where you may disclose Personal Data on behalf of another person, you undertake and will ensure that the individual whose Personal Data is supplied to HIA has authorized the disclosure, is informed of and consents to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Notice before you disclose such Personal Data. Where the disclosure if in respect of a child’s Personal Data, you should do as only as the parent or legal guardian of that child. 

 

6. WHY DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL DATA?


6.1 To provide services in relation to your passenger journey
 

(i)What does this mean?
 

Our Mobile App’s boarding scan feature processes your Personal Data to provide flight details. If you choose to share your location in our Mobile App, we process your location to notify you when entering or exiting the Airport and allow you to navigate from one point to the other at airport.


(ii) What are our legal grounds for doing this? 

We process your Personal Data based on your consent provided through the Mobile App. 


(iii) Which Personal Data do we use for this purpose?

For this purpose, we may use the Personal Data you entered into the Mobile Apps, including scanning of the boarding pass, and the technical data from your device such as its IP-address (including approximate location). 

6.2 When you interact with Hamad International Airport (online or offline)
 

(a) For answering your questions or responding to your complaints or requests

(i)What does this mean?
 

If you get in touch with us in person, via email, website, telephone, in writing or through our customer services agents or social media or by your authorised representative for the purposes of the relevant enquiry, we will use your Personal Data in order to reply to and answer your question or to respond to your complaints or requests (e.g. to assist you in processing a transaction or in providing technical assistance).


(ii) What are our legal grounds for doing this? 

We will process your Personal Data based on our legitimate business interests in providing customer care to you based on your request and depending on the specific case. 


(iii) Which Personal Data do we use for this purpose?

We may use your name, contact details, email address, date of travel, origin, destination, your correspondence with HIA about your questions and all other Personal Data necessary to answer your questions. We may monitor or record your phone conversations for training and customer services purposes. 

 (b) To allow you to connect with us  via social media 


(i) What does this mean?

Hamad International Airport is active on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Instagram. When you contact us via social media, we will use your Personal Data in order to answer your questions and to respond to your messages.

 
(ii) What are our legal grounds for doing this? 

We process your Personal Data based on our legitimate interest to provide customer care, based on your request, and to understand your preference and interests.


(iii) Which Personal Data do we use for this purpose?

Depending on the the communication channel you have chosen to use to connect with us, we use any Personal Data you supply to HIA. This may include your name, address, email address, gender and other Personal Data you have included in your message. In addition, when you click one of the buttons displayed for example “Like” or “Share” on one of our social media pages to indicate your interest and communicate with your network via the third party social media platform, the relevant social media platform might place cookies on your device.  To read more about cookies, visit https://dohahamadairport.com/cookie-policy.

6.3 For the use of, development and improvement of our facilities and/or services


(i) What does this mean?

It’s important for us to continue to provide you with our award-winning Airport facilities, services and uphold the HIA brand. In order to achieve the, we use your Personal Data so that we can assess, analyse and improve our facilities and services to you. For this purpose, we keep track of how often you visit our Website and which pages you click on. We may also use non-identifiable user location to identify points of interest at the Airport.  

 When you access and use HIA Wi-Fi services, we will process your Personal Data in order to provide such Wi-Fi services to you.

Our research results are only reported within our organisation on an aggregated basis. 

 We also regularly use surveys to find out whether you are satisfied with our service. These surveys are conducted through our Website. We use your responses to surveys for quality assessments and to improve your customer experience.

With respect to Personal Data processed in relation to our Wi-Fi we will process your Personal Data based on the performance of a contract, in accordance with our Wi-Fi Terms of Use. 

 In addition, we process your Personal Data as it is our legitimate interest to continuously improve our services.

 Where we process location data, we do so based on your consent.

[{'mcn_title': 'Hotel Desks', 'mcn_body': '

For your convenience, service desks representing a variety of hotels are available in a dedicated area of the passenger terminal.

Whether you’ve made a reservation in advance or plan to book on arrival, Qatar offers a wide variety of hotels to suit different needs and preferences. Just follow the signs, ask at an information desk or use our airport map to find your way to the hotel service desk area that is located on the ground level near the Short Term Car Park.

Complimentary hotel transfers

Some hotels may offer a complimentary shuttle bus transfer between the passenger terminal and the hotel. Please confirm availability when making your reservation.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'hotel desks, booking hotel, facilities, facility', 'mcn_created_on': '1655984637', 'mcn_modified_on': '1740033318', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/facilities/mi_hoteldesks_0.png']}, {'mcn_title': 'مكاتب الفنادق', 'mcn_body': '

حرصاً على راحتك، تتوفر مكاتب الخدمة التي تمثّل مجموعة متنوعة من الفنادق في منطقة محدّدة في مبنى المسافرين.

سواءً قمت بالحجز بشكل مسبق، أو كنت تخطط للحجز عند وصولك، فإن قطر توفر لك مجموعة من الفنادق المتنوعة التي تلبي كل احتياجاتك وتفضيلاتك المختلفة. كل ما عليك هو اتباع اللوحة الإرشادية أو الاستفسار لدى مكتب الاستعلامات أو استخدام مخطط المطار للعثور على منطقة مكاتب خدمة الفنادق الواقعة في الدور الأرضي بالقرب من مواقف قصيرة الأمد.

التوصيل للفندق مجّاناً

قد توفر بعض الفنادق خدمة التوصيل عبر الحافلات بين مبنى المسافرين والفندق. يرجى تأكيد توفر هذه الخدمة عند القيام بالحجز.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'hotel desks, booking hotel, facilities, facility', 'mcn_created_on': '1660203209', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660203231', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/facilities/mi_hoteldesks_0.png']}]

[{'mcn_title': 'Collect on Return ', 'mcn_body': "

Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return service is a convenient and hassle-free shopping experience offered to passengers traveling through Hamad International Airport (DOH) to any destination.

This unique service allows travelers to browse and purchase a wide range of products from leading international brands while departing from DOH and then collect their purchases upon their return to the airport.

With Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return, customers can enjoy the luxury of shopping at their own pace, avoiding the need to carry their purchases during their trip.

The service ensures a stress-free shopping experience, with purchases securely stored and readily available for collection upon arrival at the airport.

Whether it's luxury goods, electronics, cosmetics, or souvenirs, Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return offers a convenient and efficient way to shop duty free, making travel even more enjoyable.

Passengers can collect their purchases at the Arrivals terminal near the luggage carrousels. 

*Terms & Conditions Apply*

1. Chewing Tobacco along with cigarettes and alcohol are strictly prohibited for this service.

2. The maximum allowed quantity for cigars is 50 sticks

3. Collect on Return services are only available to passengers arriving at Hamad International Airport Arrivals Terminal and not to other terminals/Doha International Airport.

4. If guests forget to collect their items, they must communicate with the customer service team.

5. Due to customs restrictions, customers cannot collect their items from the responsible staff after crossing the customs border.

 

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1684653170', 'mcn_modified_on': '1734863329', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}, {'mcn_title': 'الاستلام عند الإرجاع', 'mcn_body': '

يوفر لك السوق الحرة القطرية خدمة "الاستلام عند العودة"، لتستمتع بتجربة تسوق مريحة وسهلة عند سفرك عبر مطار حمد الدولي إلى أي وجهة.

تتيح هذه الخدمة الفريدة للمسافرين استكشاف وشراء مجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات التي تقدمها أشهر العلامات التجارية العالمية الرائدة أثناء مغادرتهم من مطار حمد الدولي ثم استلام مشترياتهم عند عودتهم إلى المطار.

فبفضل هذه الخدمة الرائعة "الاستلام عند العودة" التي يقدمها السوق الحرة القطرية، يمكنك الاستمتاع برفاهية التسوق بسهولة وراحة ليس لهما مثيل، لأنك ببساطة لن تضطر إلى حمل مشترياتك أثناء رحلتك.

كما تضمن لك هذه الخدمة الراقية تجربة تسوق خالية من القلق والتوتر، حيث يتم تخزين مشترياتك بشكل آمن وإتاحتها لتتسلمها بسهولة عند وصولك إلى المطار.

وسواء كانت مشترياتك عبارة عن سلع فاخرة أو إلكترونية أو مستحضرات تجميل أو هدايا تذكارية، فإن خدمة "الاستلام عند العودة"، التي تقدمها السوق الحرة القطرية" توفر لك طريقة مريحة وفعالة للتسوق في السوق الحرة، مما يضمن لك تجربة سفر ممتعة.

يمكنك استلام مشترياتك في صالة الوصول بالقرب من عربات الأمتعة.

* تطبق الشروط والأحكام *

1. علكات التبغ والسجائر والمشروبات الكحولية غير مشمولة في هذه الخدمة.

2. الحد الأقصى للكمية المسموح بها من السيجار الفاخر هي 50 سيجارًا فقط.

3. يتم توفير خدمة "الاستلام عند العودة" فقط للمسافرين الذين يصلون إلى صالة الوصول بمطار حمد الدولي وليس إلى مباني الركاب الأخرى/مطار الدوحة الدولي.

4. في حالة نسيان الضيوف استلام أغراضهم، يجب عليهم التواصل مع فريق خدمة العملاء.

5. نظرًا للقيود الجمركية، لا يمكن للعملاء استلام أغراضهم من الموظفين المسؤولين بعد عبور الحدود الجمركية.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1684653170', 'mcn_modified_on': '1734863329', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}]
description_en:
Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return service is a convenient and hassle-free shopping experience offered to passengers traveling through Hamad International Airport (DOH) to any destination.

This unique service allows travelers to browse and purchase a wide range of products from leading international brands while departing from DOH and then collect their purchases upon their return to the airport.

With Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return, customers can enjoy the luxury of shopping at their own pace, avoiding the need to carry their purchases during their trip.

The service ensures a stress-free shopping experience, with purchases securely stored and readily available for collection upon arrival at the airport.

Whether it's luxury goods, electronics, cosmetics, or souvenirs, Qatar Duty Free Collect on Return offers a convenient and efficient way to shop duty free, making travel even more enjoyable.

Passengers can collect their purchases at the Arrivals terminal near the luggage carrousels. 

*Terms & Conditions Apply*

1. Chewing Tobacco along with cigarettes and alcohol are strictly prohibited for this service.

2. The maximum allowed quantity for cigars is 50 sticks

3. Collect on Return services are only available to passengers arriving at Hamad International Airport Arrivals Terminal and not to other terminals/Doha International Airport.

4. If guests forget to collect their items, they must communicate with the customer service team.

5. Due to customs restrictions, customers cannot collect their items from the responsible staff after crossing the customs border.

[{'mcn_title': 'Giorgio Armani', 'mcn_body': '

The Giorgio Armani boutique showcases the brand’s refined, elegant style. In this well-lit, harmonious space, you can get swept away by the latest women’s and men’s clothing and accessories collections, as well as discover haute couture jewellery and Armani Privé fragrances. At the Giorgio Armani boutique, you can take advantage of exclusive Made-to-Measure and Made-to-Order services, creating one-of-a-kind, bespoke items with an everlasting allure.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659251516', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639250', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_giorgio.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'جورجيو أرماني', 'mcn_body': '

يُجسد متجر جورجيو أرماني Giorgio Armani رُقي وأناقة هذه العلامة التجارية الفاخرة، استمتع بتجربة تسوق فريدة في هذه المساحة ذات التصميم المتناغم والإضاءة الرائعة، لاقتناء أحدث الملابس والإكسسوارات النسائية والرجالية، بالإضافة إلى اكتشاف مجموعة من أفخم وأرقى المجوهرات، بالإضافة لعطور أرماني برايف Armani Privé، كما يوفر لك متجر جورجيو أرماني خدمات حصرية وفريدة، حيث يمكنك اقتناء منتجات يتم صناعتها وتصميمها لك خصيصًا حسب المقاس والمواصفات التي تطلبها، بالإضافة إلى ابتكار تصميمات فريدة من نوعها بلمسات مدهشة تُلبي رغباتك وتفوق توقعاتك وتضفي لك مزيدًا من السحر والجاذبية.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659251516', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639250', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_giorgio.jpg']}]

In this well-lit, harmonious space, you can get swept away by the latest women’s and men’s clothing and accessories collections, as well as discover haute couture jewellery and Armani Privé fragrances. At the Giorgio Armani boutique, you can take advantage of exclusive Made-to-Measure and Made-to-Order services, creating one-of-a-kind, bespoke items with an everlasting allure.

[{'mcn_title': 'Dolce & Gabbana', 'mcn_body': '

 The Dolce & Gabbana boutique offers a full assortment of the Italian luxury house’s womenswear and menswear lines with a key focus on leathergoods, accessories and ready-to-wear collections. Italian textiles and marble decorate the space, paying homage to the Italian heritage of Dolce & Gabbana.

 

 

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646645104', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639236', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/dolce_gabbana_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/dolce_gabbana.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'دولتشي أند غابانا', 'mcn_body': '

يُقدم متجر دولتشي آند غابانا Dolce & Gabbana مجموعة متنوعة وشاملة من الملابس والإكسسوارات النسائية والرجالية، فدار الموضة الإيطالية الفاخرة تركز بشكل رئيسي على المنتجات الجلدية والإكسسوارات والملابس الجاهزة التي تواكب أحدث صيحات الموضة، ويتميز المتجر بتصميمه الفاخر الذي يميزه المنسوجات الرائعة والرخام الإيطالي الفخم، والذي يحتفي بالتراث الإيطالي العريق لهذه العلامة التجارية الراقية "دولتشي آند غابانا".

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646645104', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639236', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/dolce_gabbana_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/dolce_gabbana.jpg']}]
description_en: The Dolce & Gabbana boutique offers a full assortment of the Italian luxury house’s womenswear and menswear lines with a key focus on leathergoods, accessories and ready-to-wear collections. Italian textiles and marble decorate the space, paying homage to the Italian heritage of Dolce & Gabbana.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Discover Qatar Transit Desk', 'mcn_body': '

Discover Qatar Transit Desk

Book your city tour or get your visa!

 

  • If your transit is 6 hours or more, you can turn your stop into an extended holiday. Join a city tour of Doha, the city where modernity meets Arabic tradition, or you can Discover Doha your Way, with your private vehicle and chauffeur.
  • For transit times of 8 hours or more, you can take a safari tour and discover the Desert and Inland Sea, one of only three places in the world where the Arabian desert meets the sea.
  • For 4 hours transit time, we have an airport-based tour where you can Discover Hamad International Airport’s impressive art installations with our expert guide. 

 

  • Qatar Transit Visa: Nationalities from 100+ countries can enter Qatar visa-free. If you do not qualify for visa-free entry, you can apply for a Transit Visa for QAR 100 at Discover Qatar Transit Desk at HIA.

To check visa requirements, please see the Visit Qatar website.

 

For more information or to make your booking, please visit Discover Qatar Desk located in the Duty Free area, or visit discoverqatar.qa/transit-tours, or call +974 4144 5150.

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Discover Qatar Transit Tours, Qatar Tourism Authority, QTA, Doha Tours, Transit, Transfer, Complimentary Tour, The Pearl Qatar, Katara Cultural Village, Museum of Islamic Art, Souq Waqif, Shops', 'mcn_created_on': '1658823042', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639222', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/transit-screen-1920x1080_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/transit-screen-1920x1080.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'مكتب "اكتشف قطر" لتحويل الرحلات', 'mcn_body': '

احجز جولة في مدينة الدوحة أو احصل على التأشيرة!

  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 6 ساعات أو أكثر، فيمكنك الاستمتاع بعطلة مميزة في محطة انتظارك. شارك في جولة سياحية في الدوحة، المدينة التي يمتزج فيها التطور والحداثة بعراقة التقاليد العربية، أو اكتشف الدوحة بطريقتك، في سيارة خاصة بك يقودها سائق.
  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 8 ساعات أو أكثر، يمكنك المشاركة في جولة سفاري واكتشاف الصحراء وخور العديد، وهو واحد من ثلاثة مواقع على مستوى العالم تلتقي فيه رمال الصحراء الذهبية بزرقة البحر.
  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 4 ساعات، نقدم لك جولة في مطار حمد الدولي لاستكشاف المعروضات الفنية المبهرة التي تزين ردهاته وأركانه برفقة مرشدنا السياحي الخبير.

 

  • تأشيرة العبور في قطر: يمكن للمسافرين من أكثر من 100 جنسية الدخول إلى قطر بدون تأشيرة. وإذا لم تكن مؤهلاً للدخول بدون تأشيرة، فيمكنك التقدم بطلب للحصول على تأشيرة عبور تكلفتها 100 ريال قطري من مكتب اكتشف قطر لتحويل الرحلات في مطار حمد الدولي.

لمعرفة متطلبات الحصول على التأشيرة، يُرجى زيارة موقع Visit Qatar الإلكتروني.

 

للمزيد من المعلومات والحجز، يُرجى زيارة مكتب "اكتشف قطر" الموجود في مركز السوق الحرة، أو تفضل بزيارة الرابط discoverqatar.qa/transit-tours، أو الاتصال على الرقم 97441445150+.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Discover Qatar Transit Tours, Qatar Tourism Authority, QTA, Doha Tours, Transit, Transfer, Complimentary Tour, The Pearl Qatar, Katara Cultural Village, Museum of Islamic Art, Souq Waqif, Shops', 'mcn_created_on': '1658823042', 'mcn_modified_on': '1733639222', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/transit-screen-1920x1080_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/transit-screen-1920x1080.jpg']}]
description_en:
Discover Qatar Transit Desk

Book your city tour or get your visa!

 

  • If your transit is 6 hours or more, you can turn your stop into an extended holiday. Join a city tour of Doha, the city where modernity meets Arabic tradition, or you can Discover Doha your Way, with your private vehicle and chauffeur.
  • For transit times of 8 hours or more, you can take a safari tour and discover the Desert and Inland Sea, one of only three places in the world where the Arabian desert meets the sea.
  • For 4 hours transit time, we have an airport-based tour where you can Discover Hamad International Airport’s impressive art installations with our expert guide. 

 

  • Qatar Transit Visa: Nationalities from 100+ countries can enter Qatar visa-free. If you do not qualify for visa-free entry, you can apply for a Transit Visa for QAR 100 at Discover Qatar Transit Desk at HIA.

To check visa requirements, please see the Visit Qatar website.

 

For more information or to make your booking, please visit Discover Qatar Desk located in the Duty Free area, or visit discoverqatar.qa/transit-tours, or call +974 4144 5150.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Discover Qatar Arrivals Desk', 'mcn_body': '

If you would like to book, or have already booked a tour, an airport transfer or a transit product with Discover Qatar, this desk will be your meeting point with your guide or chauffeur.

Discover Qatar offers an exclusive range of activities that can be conveniently booked at this desk.

Some available tours:

  • Our popular City Tour introduces you to Katara Cultural Village and the world-famous Souq Waqif, along with views of the Corniche, The Pearl of Qatar and the Museum of Islamic Art. 
  • A Safari tour to the desert and Inland Sea, one of the few places in the world where the sea meets the desert to produce spectacular and unique landscapes. 
  • Discover Doha by Air, a 45-minute flight over Doha’s most iconic sites, impressive skyline and FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ stadiums. Explore breath-taking landscapes and iconic landmarks from the unparalleled comfort and convenience of a light aircraft.

For further information and booking, please visit discoverqatar.qa or visit the multiple Discover Qatar Kiosks at the Hamad International Airport in Transit or Arrivals area. You may also call +974 4144 5150.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1721547812', 'mcn_modified_on': '1721720166', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Grid_Qatar_Souq_Restaurant_4215-1-1920x1080.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'مكتب "اكتشف قطر" لتحويل الرحلات', 'mcn_body': '

احجز جولة في مدينة الدوحة أو احصل على التأشيرة!

  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 6 ساعات أو أكثر، فيمكنك الاستمتاع بعطلة مميزة في محطة انتظارك. شارك في جولة سياحية في الدوحة، المدينة التي يمتزج فيها التطور والحداثة بعراقة التقاليد العربية، أو اكتشف الدوحة بطريقتك، في سيارة خاصة بك يقودها سائق.
  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 8 ساعات أو أكثر، يمكنك المشاركة في جولة سفاري واكتشاف الصحراء وخور العديد، وهو واحد من ثلاثة مواقع على مستوى العالم تلتقي فيه رمال الصحراء الذهبية بزرقة البحر، أو يمكنك الصعود على متن حافلة النقل الترددية المريحة التي تتنقل بين مطار حمد الدولي وثلاث وجهات شهيرة في الدوحة.
  • إذا كانت مدة التوقف بين الرحلات 4 ساعات، نقدم لك جولة في مطار حمد الدولي لاستكشاف المعروضات الفنية المبهرة التي تزين ردهاته وأركانه برفقة مرشدنا السياحي الخبير.

 

  • تأشيرة العبور في قطر: يمكن للمسافرين من أكثر من 100 جنسية الدخول إلى قطر بدون تأشيرة. وإذا لم تكن مؤهلاً للدخول بدون تأشيرة، فيمكنك التقدم بطلب للحصول على تأشيرة عبور تكلفتها 100 ريال قطري من مكتب اكتشف قطر لتحويل الرحلات في مطار حمد الدولي.

لمعرفة متطلبات الحصول على التأشيرة، يُرجى زيارة موقع Visit Qatar الإلكتروني.

للمزيد من المعلومات والحجز، يُرجى زيارة مكتب "اكتشف قطر" الموجود في مركز السوق الحرة، أو تفضل بزيارة الرابط discoverqatar.qa/transit-tours، أو الاتصال على الرقم 97441445150+.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1721547812', 'mcn_modified_on': '1721720166', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Grid_Qatar_Souq_Restaurant_4215-1-1920x1080.jpg']}]
description_en:
If you would like to book, or have already booked a tour, an airport transfer or a transit product with Discover Qatar, this desk will be your meeting point with your guide or chauffeur.

Discover Qatar offers an exclusive range of activities that can be conveniently booked at this desk.

Some available tours:

  • Our popular City Tour introduces you to Katara Cultural Village and the world-famous Souq Waqif, along with views of the Corniche, The Pearl of Qatar and the Museum of Islamic Art. 
  • A Safari tour to the desert and Inland Sea, one of the few places in the world where the sea meets the desert to produce spectacular and unique landscapes. 
  • Discover Doha by Air, a 45-minute flight over Doha’s most iconic sites, impressive skyline and FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ stadiums. Explore breath-taking landscapes and iconic landmarks from the unparalleled comfort and convenience of a light aircraft.

For further information and booking, please visit discoverqatar.qa or visit the multiple Discover Qatar Kiosks at the Hamad International Airport in Transit or Arrivals area. You may also call +974 4144 5150.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Dior Luxury Beauty Retreat', 'mcn_body': '

Located in the airport Orchard, the Dior Luxury Beauty Retreat is an absolute cocoon that will delight visitors’ senses and reinvent the art of travel by providing a genuine moment of well-being. A two-floor boutique and spa offers the most exclusive retail experience between flights.

The boutique displays Dior Maison objects paired with the colourful perfumes and unique olfactory territories of La Collection Privée Christian Dior.

Exceptional Dior skincare products are also on display, while the skin scanner offers travelers a customized skin diagnosis in the boutique. The Spa Is Home to Eight Treatment Rooms. Each room reveals its own identity, taking up the design codes of the House Of Dior.

Book yourself an anti-jet lag treatment while waiting for your next flight.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1668411834', 'mcn_modified_on': '1716125598', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/03.Dior__1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/03.Dior__0.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'ديور لاكشري بيوتي ريتريت', 'mcn_body': '

منتجع ديور الفاخر للتجميل 

يقع منتجع ديور في حديقة أوتشارد بالمطار، ويُعد وجهة رائعة للزوار لتدليل حواسهم، حيث يُضفى المنتجع سعادة غامرة للمسافرين من خلال إمتاعهم بالمعنى الحقيقي للرفاهية والاستجمام، فهذا البوتيك الأنيق والمنتجع الصحي المرموق والمكون من طابقين يقدم تجربة من أروع تجارب البيع بالتجزئة وأكثرها تميزًا بالمطارات.

 يعرض البوتيك منتجات Dior Maison المتميزة جنبًا إلى جنب مع أفخم العطور الملونة والفريدة من La Collection Privée Christian Dior

يوفر البوتيك أيضًا منتجات Dior الاستثنائية للعناية بالبشرة، كما يقدم تشخيصًا مخصصًا للبشرة في المتجر للمسافرين من خلال جهاز فحص الجلد،   ويضم المنتجع الصحي ثماني غرف علاجية، حيث تكشف كل غرفة عن هويتها الخاصة، وتمثل أيقونة رائعة لرموز التصميم الخاصة بدار ديور ..

دلل نفسك وسارع بحجز جلسة علاج مضاد لاضطراب الرحلات الجوية الطويلة لتستمتع بها خلال انتظار رحلتك القادمة.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1668411834', 'mcn_modified_on': '1716125598', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/03.Dior__1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/03.Dior__0.jpg']}]
description_en:
Located in the airport Orchard, the Dior Luxury Beauty Retreat is an absolute cocoon that will delight visitors’ senses and reinvent the art of travel by providing a genuine moment of well-being. A two-floor boutique and spa offers the most exclusive retail experience between flights.

The boutique displays Dior Maison objects paired with the colourful perfumes and unique olfactory territories of La Collection Privée Christian Dior.

Exceptional Dior skincare products are also on display, while the skin scanner offers travelers a customized skin diagnosis in the boutique. The Spa Is Home to Eight Treatment Rooms. Each room reveals its own identity, taking up the design codes of the House Of Dior.

Book yourself an anti-jet lag treatment while waiting for your next flight.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Al Safwa First Lounge', 'mcn_body': '

Every inch has been specially designed to create the most luxurious lounge experience imaginable. The focus is on perfecting every moment with meticulous attention to detail so you enjoy a seamless journey from start to finish. The Al Safwa First Lounge is a gleaming example of Arabian grandeur and exclusivity in a refined setting. It is designed for those who enjoy the finer things in life and want to make the most out of every moment. It is truly a first-class experience that’s exclusively yours.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Al Safwa Lounge, Relax, Refresh, Comfort, Convenience, Premium Passengers, First Class Lounge, Facility, Facilities, Lounge', 'mcn_created_on': '1655968448', 'mcn_modified_on': '1711525147', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/lounge/mi_alsafwalounge1_0.png']}, {'mcn_title': 'صالة الصفوة للدرجة الأولى', 'mcn_body': '

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Al Safwa Lounge, Relax, Refresh, Comfort, Convenience, Premium Passengers, First Class Lounge, Facility, Facilities, Lounge', 'mcn_created_on': '1660204972', 'mcn_modified_on': '1711525147', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/lounge/mi_alsafwalounge1_0.png']}]

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Dosa Factory', 'mcn_body': '

The Dosa Factory perfectly captures the essence of gritty and urban modern India and gives it a twist of urban cool. It is a quick-service brand celebrating South Indian dishes. Visit the Dosa factory for a culinary journey through South India, where Dosa is eaten as breakfast, a snack, or a light meal.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971639', 'mcn_modified_on': '1704616651', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Dosa%20Factory%20_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Dosa%20Factory%20.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'دوسا فاكتوري ', 'mcn_body': '

يُجسد مطعم دوسا فاكتوري Dosa Factory ببراعة جوهر الثقافة الهندية العصرية الجريئة والمتطورة، ويُعد دوسا فاكتوري علامة تجارية مميزة للوجبات السريعة، تحتفي بأطباق جنوب الهند،

فهذا المطعم المرموق يأخذ ضيوفه في جولة ساحرة للاستمتاع بأروع أصناف مطبخ جنوب الهند وأكثرها تميزًا، حيث يقدم الدوسا اللذيذة والتي يتم تناولها غالبًا كوجبة إفطار أو كوجبة خفيفة أو تسالي.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971665', 'mcn_modified_on': '1704616676', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Dosa%20Factory%20_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Dosa%20Factory%20.jpg']}]
description_en: The Dosa Factory perfectly captures the essence of gritty and urban modern India and gives it a twist of urban cool. It is a quick-service brand celebrating South Indian dishes. Visit the Dosa factory for a culinary journey through South India, where Dosa is eaten as breakfast, a snack, or a light meal.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Souq Al Matar ', 'mcn_body': '

Discover the vibrant spirt of Souq Al Matar, a traditional Qatari Souq conveniently located within the North node terminal at the airport. With seven unique shops and two local restaurants, travellers can immerse themselves in Qatar’s rich heritage and hospitality without leaving the airport terminal. Welcome to an exceptional transit tourism experience at the World’s Best Airport!

 

Khaneen features a collection of high-quality fragrances with premium packaging and traditional yet modern scents by home-based designers.

Al Attar offers a unique apothecary store experience, where customers can explore an assortment of premium honey, dates, coffees, teas, herbs and spices, ideal those looking to take a piece of Qatari culture back home.

Sogha or travel gifts finds expressions here as a souvenir shop, showcasing a variety of keepsakes designed for gifting or as a personal memento.

Fwala offers a tantalising assortment of traditional Qatari sweets.

Al Darzi is a women’s fashion shop displaying a vibrant array of traditional garments.

Al Beshit is the men’s wear shop at Souq Al Matar. It features a collection of traditional Qatar clothing.

Dukkan offers a selection of affordable confectionery and snacks, including the renowned Pafki chips and other local delicacies that will stir nostalgia in older generations of Qatari shoppers.

Basta is a modern Qatari concept that serves traditional food with a modern twist

Chapati and Karak - Qatar’s acclaimed café restaurant concept - was inspired by traditional Indian cuisine and has been a staple of Qatar’s dining scene for more than 50 years.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1703659435', 'mcn_modified_on': '1704183755', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Souq%20al%20matar%20without%20Steel%20Pillar.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Souq%20al%20matar.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'سوق المطار', 'mcn_body': '

اكتشف الروح الثقافية لسوق المطار، السوق القطري التقليدي الذي يقع في الجزء الشمالي من المبنى الرئيسي لمطار حمد الدولي. مع افتتاح سبعة متاجر فريدة ومطاعم محلية في سوق المطار، أصبح هناك خيارات أكثر للمسافرين تمكنهم من الاندماج مع التراث الغني والضيافة في قطر دون مغادرة صالة المطار. مرحباً بكم في تجربة سياحية أستثنائية في أفضل مطار في العالم!

 

متجر خنين ـ يتميز المتجر بمجموعة مذهلة من العطور عالية الجودة والتي تمتاز بروائح عربية تقليدية وحديثة تم تركيبها من قبل مصممين محليين.

 

متجر العطار ـ يقدم المتجر تجربة العطارة الفريدة من نوعها، حيث يمكن للعملاء استكشاف مجموعة متنوعة من العسل والتمر والقهوة والشاي والأعشاب والتوابل الفاخرة، ليكون بذلك المتجر مكاناً مثالياً لأولئك الذين يتطلعون لأخد هدايا محلية الصنع إلى وطنهم.

 

صوغه ـ هو متجر للهدايا التذكارية في السوق، يعرض مجموعة متنوعة من التذكارات التي تعد مثالية للإهداء أو للإقتناء الشخصي.

 

فواله ـ ـيقدم المتجر تشكيلة متميزة من الحلويات القطرية التقليدية

 

الدرزة  - هو متجر أزياء نسائي يعرض مجموعة مذهلة من الملابس التقليدية

 

البشت هو اسم متجر الملابس الرجالية في سوق المطار. يضم مجموعة من الملابس القطرية التقليدية.

 

دُكّان ـ يقدم المتجر مجموعة مختارة من الحلويات والوجبات الخفيفة بأسعار مناسبة، بما في ذلك رقائق بفكي الشهيرة وغيرها من المنتجات المحلية التي توقظ الحنين إلى الماضي لدى العديد من المسافرين القطريين.

بسطة ـ وهو مطعم قطري حديث، يقدم الطعام التقليدي مع لمسة عصرية.

شباتي وكرك ـ واحد من المقاهي الشهيرة في قطر والمتواجد فيها منذ أكثر من 50 عاماً ويقدم مأكولات مستوحاة من المطبخ الهندي التقليدي.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1703659435', 'mcn_modified_on': '1704183755', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Souq%20al%20matar%20without%20Steel%20Pillar.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Souq%20al%20matar.jpg']}]
description_en:
Discover the vibrant spirt of Souq Al Matar, a traditional Qatari Souq conveniently located within the North node terminal at the airport. With seven unique shops and two local restaurants, travellers can immerse themselves in Qatar’s rich heritage and hospitality without leaving the airport terminal. Welcome to an exceptional transit tourism experience at the World’s Best Airport!

 

Khaneen features a collection of high-quality fragrances with premium packaging and traditional yet modern scents by home-based designers.

Al Attar offers a unique apothecary store experience, where customers can explore an assortment of premium honey, dates, coffees, teas, herbs and spices, ideal those looking to take a piece of Qatari culture back home.

Sogha or travel gifts finds expressions here as a souvenir shop, showcasing a variety of keepsakes designed for gifting or as a personal memento.

Fwala offers a tantalising assortment of traditional Qatari sweets.

Al Darzi is a women’s fashion shop displaying a vibrant array of traditional garments.

Al Beshit is the men’s wear shop at Souq Al Matar. It features a collection of traditional Qatar clothing.

Dukkan offers a selection of affordable confectionery and snacks, including the renowned Pafki chips and other local delicacies that will stir nostalgia in older generations of Qatari shoppers.

Basta is a modern Qatari concept that serves traditional food with a modern twist

Chapati and Karak - Qatar’s acclaimed café restaurant concept - was inspired by traditional Indian cuisine and has been a staple of Qatar’s dining scene for more than 50 years.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Giraffe World Kitchen', 'mcn_body': "

Giraffe is founded on authentic experiences from across the globe, woven into ever-changing menus.

Giraffe appeals to international airport passengers who seek authenticity and reassurance from a recognized name.

One can enjoy breakfast, dinner, drinks, and fantastic coffee. The food is fast and fresh, in tune with the needs of the travelling guest.

The menu will be guaranteed within ten minutes on the table (promise!) Giraffe creates both an inviting sit-down atmosphere as a takeaway service to leaving a lasting 'feel good' impression on the guests.

 

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697973427', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219976', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Giraffe_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Giraffe.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'جيراف ', 'mcn_body': '

جيراف

يتميز مطعم جيراف بتقديم مجموعة متنوعة من القوائم الشهية التي تجمع بشكل متناغم وفريد بين أروع اللمسات العالمية الأصيلة والمبتكرة والتي تناسب مختلف الأذواق وتواكب التفضيلات المتغيرة باستمرار.

 جيراف هيو الخيار الأمثل للمسافرين بالمطار الدولي الذين يرغبون في تناول وجبات لذيذة وفائقة الجودة بأحد أشهر المطاعم وأكثرها موثوقية.

 يمكنك الاستمتاع بوجبات الإفطار والعشاء بالإضافة إلى تناول أروع المشروبات والقهوة اللذيذة، حيث يقدم لك جيراف أشهى الأطعمة السريعة والطازجة التي تلبي تفضيلاتك خلال السفر.

 يلتزم جيراف بتقديم الأصناف التي تختارها في غضون عشر دقائق على الطاولة (وعد!)، وبالإضافة إلى اشتهاره بتقديم أروع وجبات       ال "تيك أواي"، يتميز جيراف بأجوائه الرائعة والجذابة لإمتاعك بأفضل الأوقات وترك انطباعًا رائعًا ودائمًا لديك "شعورًا بالسعادة".

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697973470', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219988', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Giraffe_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Giraffe.jpg']}]
description_en:
Giraffe is founded on authentic experiences from across the globe, woven into ever-changing menus.

Giraffe appeals to international airport passengers who seek authenticity and reassurance from a recognized name.

One can enjoy breakfast, dinner, drinks, and fantastic coffee. The food is fast and fresh, in tune with the needs of the travelling guest.

The menu will be guaranteed within ten minutes on the table (promise!) Giraffe creates both an inviting sit-down atmosphere as a takeaway service to leaving a lasting 'feel good' impression on the guests.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'YO! Sushi', 'mcn_body': "

We're all about fresh, flavorsome, authentic Japanese food. Sushi is what we're known for and we also have a mouth-watering range of hot food, from traditional classics to innovative fusion dishes, packed with rich, aromatic flavors and all-natural ingredients.

\r\n", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971545', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219883', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Sushi_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Sushi.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'يو! سوشي', 'mcn_body': '

يشتهر يو! سوشي بتقديم أفخم أطباق السوشي بالإضافة إلى قائمة من ألذ الأطعمة اليابانية الطازجة، ومجموعة من أشهى الأصناف الساخنة وأكثرها تميزًا، بدءًا من الأطباق الكلاسيكية التقليدية وحتى الأطباق المبتكرة، التي تفوح بالنكهات الغنية والعطرية والتي يتم إعدادها بشكل كامل من المكونات الطبيعية.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971598', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219895', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Sushi_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Sushi.jpg']}]
description_en: We're all about fresh, flavorsome, authentic Japanese food. Sushi is what we're known for and we also have a mouth-watering range of hot food, from traditional classics to innovative fusion dishes, packed with rich, aromatic flavors and all-natural ingredients.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'La Terracotta Italian Kitchen', 'mcn_body': '

La Terracotta Italian Kitchen

At La Terracotta, we go back to the essence of Italian food with a focus on craftsmanship and simple, quality-driven dishes.

La Terracotta is built around a masterpiece oven in which we prepare all our fresh, authentic, and quality hot dishes on the spot. La Terracotta is your option when on the lookout for convenient fresh food that is warm, cosy, honest, fragrant, and portable.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971707', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219847', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Terracotta_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Terracotta.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'لا تيراكوتا ', 'mcn_body': '

يشتهر مطعم لا تيراكوتا ، بتقديم أشهى الأطباق الإيطالية التي يتم إعدادها باحترافية وإتقان فائق بالطرق الأصلية التي تتسم بالبساطة.

تم بناء لا تيراكوتا La Terracotta حول فرن رائع حيث نقوم بإعداد جميع الأطباق الساخنة والأصلية عالية الجودة على الفور لتُقدم طازجة.

لا تيراكوتا La Terracotta هو خيارك الأمثل، حيث يمكنك تدليل براعم تذوقك بأشهى وأجود الأصناف الطازجة والدافئة والغنية والمميزة بنكهات رائعة والتي يمكنك تناولها بالمطعم أو الاستمتاع بها خارجه.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697971730', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219860', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Terracotta_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Terracotta.jpg']}]
description_en:
La Terracotta Italian Kitchen

At La Terracotta, we go back to the essence of Italian food with a focus on craftsmanship and simple, quality-driven dishes.

La Terracotta is built around a masterpiece oven in which we prepare all our fresh, authentic, and quality hot dishes on the spot. La Terracotta is your option when on the lookout for convenient fresh food that is warm, cosy, honest, fragrant, and portable.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Le Petite Belge', 'mcn_body': '

Le Petite Belge is a unique spot where everyone can enjoy a thoughtfully selected international menu with Belgian influences, such as Gourmet Burgers, Famous Moules Frites, or Belgian Fondant.

Fresh, familiar, pushing the boundaries to suit all regional palettes.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697974600', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219797', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Le%20petit%20belge_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Le%20petit%20belge.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'لو بيتيت بيلج ', 'mcn_body': '

يعد مطعم Le Petite Belge مكانًا فريدًا للاستمتاع بقائمة من المأكولات العالمية الشهية المستوحاة من المطبخ البلجيكي، مثل الجورميه برجر والمولز فريتس الشهير (بلح البحر المطهي على البخار) وقطع الفوندان البلجيكي اللذيذة.

 لو بيتيت بيلج هو خيارك الأمثل للاستمتاع بمجموعة متنوعة ورائعة من أشهر الأكلات التي تتخطى الحدود لتناسب مختلف الأذواق والتفضيلات.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1697974645', 'mcn_modified_on': '1698219812', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Le%20petit%20belge_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Le%20petit%20belge.jpg']}]
description_en:
Le Petite Belge is a unique spot where everyone can enjoy a thoughtfully selected international menu with Belgian influences, such as Gourmet Burgers, Famous Moules Frites, or Belgian Fondant.

Fresh, familiar, pushing the boundaries to suit all regional palettes.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Unaccompanied Minors Lounge', 'mcn_body': '

Our exclusive Unaccompanied Minors Lounge (map) provides a safe and welcoming environment for children of all ages. It offers a variety of facilities, including televisions and video games, play areas, toys and puzzles, child-friendly washrooms and amenities and snacks.

When boarding begins, minors are escorted from the lounge to the aircraft. Inside the lounge, our own team of trained attendants looks after them, ensuring they’re comfortable and happy. Unaccompanied minors are escorted to the lounge while they wait for their transfer or departing flight. Only designated airline personnel can enter the lounge and all others are denied access.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'lounge, kid, child, children, minor, unaccompanied, underage', 'mcn_created_on': '1655968576', 'mcn_modified_on': '1693393982', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/lounge/mi_unaccompaniedminorslounge_1.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'صالة المسافرين الصغار بدون مرافقين', 'mcn_body': '

توفر صالتنا الحصرية المخصصة للمسافرين الصغار بدون مرافقين بيئة آمنة ومرحبة للأطفال من جميع الأعمار، حيث تتوفر فيها مجموعة متنوعة من المرافق، بما في ذلك أجهزة التلفزيون وألعاب الفيديو ومناطق اللعب والألعاب والألغاز والحمامات الملائمة للأطفال ووسائل الراحة والوجبات الخفيفة.

عند بدء الصعود إلى الطائرة تتم مرافقة الصغار من الصالة، وداخل الصالة يعتني بهم فريقنا الخاص من المدربين، مما يضمن شعورهم بالراحة والسعادة. تتم مرافقة المسافرين الصغار بدون مرافقين إلى الصالة أثناء انتظار نقلهم، أو الذهاب لرحلة المغادرة. يمكن فقط لموظفي شركات الطيران المعينين دخول الصالة، ولا يسمح لأي شخص آخر بالدخول.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'lounge, kid, child, children, minor, unaccompanied, underage', 'mcn_created_on': '1660204830', 'mcn_modified_on': '1693393982', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/lounge/mi_unaccompaniedminorslounge_1.jpg']}]
description_en:
Our exclusive Unaccompanied Minors Lounge (map) provides a safe and welcoming environment for children of all ages. It offers a variety of facilities, including televisions and video games, play areas, toys and puzzles, child-friendly washrooms and amenities and snacks.

When boarding begins, minors are escorted from the lounge to the aircraft. Inside the lounge, our own team of trained attendants looks after them, ensuring they’re comfortable and happy. Unaccompanied minors are escorted to the lounge while they wait for their transfer or departing flight. Only designated airline personnel can enter the lounge and all others are denied access.
meta_tags: lounge, kid, child, children, minor, unaccompanied, underage

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Pharmacy', 'mcn_body': '

The Pharmacy at Qatar Duty Free offers a range of self-care and medical products and last-minute essentials for your onward journey.  

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Kulud Pharmacy, Pharmaceutical, Medicine, health care, Travel Essentials, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1659255523', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690447253', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_pharmacy.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/51.-Pharmacy.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'صيدلية', 'mcn_body': '

تقدم الصيدلية في السوق الحرة القطرية مجموعة متنوعة من منتجات الرعاية الشخصية والطبية ولوازم السفر الضرورية لرحلتك القادمة.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Kulud Pharmacy, Pharmaceutical, Medicine, health care, Travel Essentials, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1659255523', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690447253', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_pharmacy.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/51.-Pharmacy.jpg']}]
description_en: The Pharmacy at Qatar Duty Free offers a range of self-care and medical products and last-minute essentials for your onward journey.
meta_tags: Kulud Pharmacy, Pharmaceutical, Medicine, health care, Travel Essentials, Shop

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Pandora', 'mcn_body': '

Pandora is a world-leading international brand known for its high-quality craftsmanship, promising its customers hand-finished, contemporary jewellery at affordable prices. 

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646640392', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690093321', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Pandora%20480x270.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'باندورا', 'mcn_body': '

تشتهر علامة باندورا التجارية الرائدة على مستوى العالم بحرفيتها عالية الجودة، وتقدم لعملاءها مجوهرات معاصرة مصنعة يدوياً وبأسعار معقولة.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646640392', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690093321', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Pandora%20480x270.jpg']}]
description_en: Pandora is a world-leading international brand known for its high-quality craftsmanship, promising its customers hand-finished, contemporary jewellery at affordable prices.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Gold', 'mcn_body': '

For lovers of fine jewellery, Au represents Midasâ€™s garden where the most exquisite selection of traditional and modern gold and diamond jewellery can be found.

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1627566933', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690093242', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Gold%20480x270.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'الذهب', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم متجر AU Gold مجموعة من المجوهرات النفيسة من عيار 9 إلى 24 قيراط والمصاغة من الذهب الأصفر والذهب الأبيض والماس والمجوهرات المرصعة بالأحجار الكريمة. كما يوفر المتجر كذلك إمكانية بيع قطع المجوهرات الجاهزة والأحجار الكريمة الفردية والماس السائب. وتشمل مجموعة منتجاته الذهب الحديث و المجوهرات الماسية والسبائك الذهبية والماس الحاصل على شهادة CNY.

 

 

 

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1627566933', 'mcn_modified_on': '1690093242', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Gold%20480x270.jpg']}]
description_en: For lovers of fine jewellery, Au represents Midasâ€™s garden where the most exquisite selection of traditional and modern gold and diamond jewellery can be found.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Samsonite', 'mcn_body': '

Samsonite boutique at HIA is the first-ever Duty-Free store in the Middle East. It offers the latest range of Samsonite Sustainable Products and allows passengers to personalise their favorite Samsonite purchase by embossing their initials on a number of Samsonite products they purchase.  

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659248080', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689757692', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/56.-Samsonite_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/56.-Samsonite.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'سامسونايت', 'mcn_body': '

بوتيك سامسونايت (Samsonite) في مطار حمد الدولي هو أول متجر لسلسلة الحقائب العالمية يتم افتتاحه في أسواق منطقة الشرق الأوسط الحرة. ويقدم المتجر أحدث مجموعة من المنتجات المستدامة للعلامة التجارية المرموقة، ويتيح أمام المسافرين فرصة إضفاء الطابع الشخصي على مشترياتهم المفضلة من سامسونايت من خلال نقش الأحرف الأولى من اسمائهم على عدد من منتجات سامسونايت التي يشترونها.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659248080', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689757692', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/56.-Samsonite_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/56.-Samsonite.jpg']}]
description_en: Samsonite boutique at HIA is the first-ever Duty-Free store in the Middle East. It offers the latest range of Samsonite Sustainable Products and allows passengers to personalise their favorite Samsonite purchase by embossing their initials on a number of Samsonite products they purchase.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'TUMI', 'mcn_body': '

The Tumi Pop-Up offers a  wide range of high-end luggage, suitcases, backpacks & travel accessories that are practical yet engineered to endure. 

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659254868', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689597213', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/55.-Tumi_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/55.-Tumi.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'تومي', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم متجر Tumi Pop-Up مجموعة واسعة من حقائب السفر وحقائب الظهر وإكسسوارات السفر العملية والمصممة هندسياً لتكون ذات قدرة تحمل عالية.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659254868', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689597213', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/55.-Tumi_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/55.-Tumi.jpg']}]
description_en: The Tumi Pop-Up offers a  wide range of high-end luggage, suitcases, backpacks & travel accessories that are practical yet engineered to endure.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Evergreen Organics', 'mcn_body': "

Evergreen Organics. Evergreen. EG. Organics. It doesn't matter what you call us, we’re still the same place that we were when we first opened our doors in 2016. We are Qatar’s first and only completely plant-based café. One hundred, quadruple, percent vegan—something we are super proud of. Every day we wake up and make fresh, delicious, and nutritious food in our kitchens in Qatar that goes near and far, even beyond our borders, into homes, offices, schools, and even airplane cabins, making a healthy lifestyle desirable without compromise. Our cafes are safe places for the conscious community. Together we are evergreen. Evergreen Organics has three (3) outlet locations in Qatar - The Pearl, Hamad International Airport and The Gate Mall, West Bay.

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1645451049', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689596250', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Banner%20480x270.png']}, {'mcn_title': 'ايفر جرين أورجانكس', 'mcn_body': '

ايفرجرين اورجانكس.ايفرجرين.اي جي.اورجانكس.ال يهم بماذا تنادونا،نحن نبقى نفس المضمون من وقت افتتاحنا في سنة ٢٠١٦.نحن أول مطعم نباتي ككل في قطر.مئة بالمئة نباتي- شيء نفتخر به. كل يوم نستيقظ و نحضر طعام طازج،لذيذ، و غذائي في مطابخنا في قطر للقريب و البعيد،حتى خارج حدودنا، الى المنازل،المكاتب،المدارس، و حتى الى كبائن الطائرة،مقدمين نمط حياة صحي مرغوب به .دون تنازالت.مطاعمنا أماكن آمنة للمجتمع. معا نحن ايفرجرين .لدى ايفرجرين اورجانكس ثالثة )٣ )مواقع في قطر- اللؤلؤة،مطار حمد الدولي و ذا غيت مول،وست باي

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1645451156', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667117368', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/Banner%20480x270.png']}]
description_en: Evergreen Organics. Evergreen. EG. Organics. It doesn't matter what you call us, we’re still the same place that we were when we first opened our doors in 2016. We are Qatar’s first and only completely plant-based café. One hundred, quadruple, percent vegan—something we are super proud of. Every day we wake up and make fresh, delicious, and nutritious food in our kitchens in Qatar that goes near and far, even beyond our borders, into homes, offices, schools, and even airplane cabins, making a healthy lifestyle desirable without compromise. Our cafes are safe places for the conscious community. Together we are evergreen. Evergreen Organics has three (3) outlet locations in Qatar - The Pearl, Hamad International Airport and The Gate Mall, West Bay.

[{'mcn_title': 'FIFA', 'mcn_body': '

The first FIFA store in the world and a home for all things football, represents a selection of officially licensed national team kits, 2022 World Cup football shirts and an impressive collection of FIFA branded products.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1668080630', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689228673', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/17.-Fifa_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/17.-Fifa.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'فيفا', 'mcn_body': '

  يُعد\u200e \u200e\u200f\u200fفيفا أول متجر على مستوى العالم لكل ما يتعلق بكرة القدم، ويُقدم\u200f مجموعة رائعة من أطقم المنتخب الوطني المرخصة رسميًا، وقمصان كأس العالم لكرة القدم 2022 بالإضافة إلى مجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات التي تحمل العلامة   التجارية المرموقة  .FIFA

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1668080630', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689228673', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/17.-Fifa_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/17.-Fifa.jpg']}]

[{'mcn_title': 'Michael Kors ', 'mcn_body': '

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Michael Kors, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Bags, Wallets, Watches, Fragrance, Sunglasses, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646640026', 'mcn_modified_on': '1689228655', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_michaelkors.jpg']}]

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Lounges', 'mcn_body': '

Al Safwa First Lounge

Every inch, every feature, and every facet is specially designed to create the most luxurious lounge experience ever imagined. The focus is on perfecting every moment with meticulous detail so that you can enjoy a seamless journey from start to departure. The Al Safwa First Lounge is a gleaming example of Arabian grandeur and elite exclusivity in a refined setting. It is designed for those who enjoy the finer things in life and want to make the most out of every moment.  It is truly a first-class experience that’s exclusively yours. The Al Safwa First lounge is located on the third level Duty Free Plaza South of Hamad International Airport. The lounge is accessible to Qatar Airways and oneworld First Class customers.
 

Al Mourjan Business Lounge - South

Offering a luxurious experience rivalling any five-star boutique hotel, Qatar Airways Al Mourjan Business Lounge promises to redefine the world standard in airport lounge experiences. From the moment you enter, your senses will be treated to a beautiful portrayal of Arabian heritage, a refreshing resort-like ambience, tantalizing a la carte and buffet dining and the signature hospitality that Qatar Airways takes pride in. The Al Mourjan Business lounge is located on the third level Duty Free Plaza South of Hamad International Airport. The lounge is accessible to Qatar Airways and oneworld Business Class customers.
 

Platinum Lounge – South

The platinum lounge is located on the second level Duty Free Plaza South and offers facilities which include complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, Prayer room .Quiet area and  shower facilities. The lounge is accessible to Qatar Airways Platinum as well as other one world airlines Emerald frequent flyer customers and eligible guests.


Gold Lounge – South

The Gold lounge south  is located on the second level Duty Free Plaza South, and offers facilities which include complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, shower facilities,. The lounge is accessible to Qatar Airways Gold  as well as other oneworld airlines Sapphire frequent flyer customers and eligible guests.

Silver Lounge –South

The Silver lounge  south is located on the second level Duty Free Plaza South, and offers facilities which include complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, shower facilities, meeting rooms, Quiet areas and family room, The lounge is accessible to Qatar Airways Silver customers and eligible guests.

First and Business Class Arrivals Lounges

First and Business class ticketed customers of Qatar Airways can access these lounges upon arrival to the airport. They are located both before and after immigration. Facilities include complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, a business centre, shower facilities and smoking room.
 

Al Maha and Oryx Lounges

Relax and rejuvenate before or after your journey in one of premium Al Maha or Oryx Lounges. Combining comfortable and award-winning service, the Lounges will immerse you in a world class experience. Facilities include complimentary Wi-Fi, shower facilities,  smoking area, television area, reading materials and a business center.

Find out more: https://www.al-mahaservices.com/AlMaha/OurServices

Al Mourjan Business Lounge – The Garden

The lounge, located in concourse C, has the ORCHARD as its focal point, which can be appreciated from the open seating area. The lounge has an expansive seating area, various food and beverage options, an improved private area and updated shower and toilet facilities. The lounge also has a spa and gym, meeting room, private dining area, prayer rooms, family rooms, game room and parents’ room.

Unaccompanied Minors Lounge

Our exclusive unaccompanied minors lounge (map) provides a safe and welcoming environment for children of all ages. It offers a variety of facilities, including:

  • Televisions and video games

  • Play areas, toys and puzzles

  • Snacks and refreshments

  • Child-friendly washrooms and amenities

Unaccompanied minors are escorted to the lounge while they wait for their transfer or departing flights. When flight boarding begins, they are escorted from the lounge to the aircraft. Only designated airline personnel can enter the lounge; no other staff or passengers are allowed access.

Inside the lounge, our own team of trained attendants looks after the children, ensuring they’re comfortable and happy.

Muzn Lounge

The multi-sensory room is equipped with a wide range of devices that achieve calm and balance in a safe environment for children on the Autism spectrum and those with special needs.

Click here to know more

Mariner Lounge

To ensure a comfortable and memorable journey for seafarers & offshore workers travelling with us, we are pleased to offer our dedicated Mariner Lounge at Hamad International Airport.  Eligible seafarers & offshore workers can relax in style and experience exclusive benefits of the new lounge in addition to our world-class service and hospitality.

The MARINER LOUNGE is centrally located on the second level Duty Free Plaza South of Hamad International Airport, within a short distance to the gates and other facilities.

Special Assistance Travellers’ Lounge

Relax in our dedicated lounge (map) while you wait for your transfer or departing flights. It offers comfortable seating, televisions and a trained attendant. Adapted washrooms are conveniently located nearby.

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1628602909', 'mcn_modified_on': '1688650686', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/relax/lounges_relax_images.png', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/relax/Lounges.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'الصالات', 'mcn_body': '

 

صالة الصفوة للدرجة الأولى

إن كل جزء من الصالة وكل تجهيز من تجهيزاتها وكل جانب من جوانبها مصمم لتوفير تجربة صالة على أرقى مستويات الرفاهية والفخامة لمسافري الدرجة الأولى.

اعرف المزيد

صالة المرجان لدرجة رجال الأعمال

بفخامة تنافس أي فندق من فئة الخمس نجوم، تعيد صالة المرجان لرجال الأعمال التابعة للخطوط الجوية القطرية بمطار حمد الدولي، تحديد المعايير العالمية لتجارب صالات المطارات. 
يقتصر الدخول على مسافري الدرجة الأولى ودرجة رجال الأعمال على رحلات الخطوط الجوية القطرية وشركات تحالف عالم واحد فقط.

اعرف المزيد

صالات المها

استمتع بفرصة للاسترخاء وتجديد نشاطك في إحدى صالات المها المميزة قبل انطلاق رحلتك من مطار حمد الدولي. تجمع صالاتنا بين التصميم المريح والخدمة الحائزة على جوائز لتقدم لك تجربة ذات مستوى عالمي.

اعرف المزيد

صالة المرجان لدرجة رجال الأعمال – الحديقة

تحتوي الصالة الجديدة، التي تعد جزءاً من توسعة الممر المركزي، على حديقة تعتبر كنقطة محورية، والتي يمكن مشاهدتها من منطقة الجلوس المفتوحة. تحتوي الصالة على منطقة جلوس واسعة وخيارات متنوعة للطعام والشراب ومنطقة خاصة محسّنة ومرافق استحمام وحمامات محدّثة. تحتوي الصالة أيضاً على سبا وصالة رياضية وغرفة اجتماعات ومنطقة طعام خاصة وغرف للصلاة وغرف عائلية وغرفة ألعاب وغرفة للآباء

صالة مزن

غرفة المثيرات الحسية المتعددة هي غرفة مجهزة بمجموعة واسعة من الأجهزة والادوات التي تحقق الهدوء والتوازن وامتصاص الطاقة الحركية الزائدة في بيئة اّمنة للمصابين بالتوحد وذوي الاحتياجات الخاصة.

اعرف المزيد

صالة البحارة

لضمان رحلة مريحة للبحارة وعمال السفن المسافرين معنا، يسرّنا أن نقدم صالة النقل البحري المخصصة لهم في مطار حمد الدولي. يمكن للبحارة وعمال السفن المؤهلين، الاسترخاء في جو من الراحة والأناقة، والاستمتاع بالمزايا الحصرية للصالة الجديدة، بالإضافة إلى خدماتنا العالمية والضيافة التي نشتهر بها. تقع صالة النقل البحري في موقع مركزي، في الطابق الثاني لساحة السوق الحرة جنوب مطار حمد الدولي، وعلى بعد مسافة قصيرة من بوابات الصعود إلى الطائرة والمرافق الأخرى.

اعرف المزيد

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1645015852', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684134965', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/relax/lounges_relax_images.png', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/relax/Lounges.jpg']}]

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Burberry', 'mcn_body': "

The Burberry Boutique at HIA offers a stunning selection of ready-to-wear and outwear pieces, bags, accessories, and footwear. In addition, the boutique features a selection of the brand's signature pieces, including Lola and Olympia bags and classic cashmere scarves.
 

", 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Burberry, Fashion, Clothing, Accessories, Fragrances, Perfumes, Sunglasses, Cosmetics, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646635960', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684650228', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/10-Burberry_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/10-Burberry.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'بربري', 'mcn_body': '

يُقدم‏ متجر بربري بمطار حمد الدولي مجموعة رائعة من الأزياء الخارجية الجاهزة والحقائب والإكسسوارات الأنيقة، وقد أصبحت هذه العلامة التجارية اللامعة تقدم مجموعة فاخرة من الأحذية جنباً إلى جنب مع منتجاتها المتنوعة والفخمة. يضُم ‏‏المتجر تشكيلة مرموقة من أفضل المنتجات وأكثرها تميزاً، مثل حقائب لولا Lola وأوليمبيا Olympia، ومعطف الترنش الشهير، والإسكارفات الكشمير الكلاسيكية المدهشة.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Burberry, Fashion, Clothing, Accessories, Fragrances, Perfumes, Sunglasses, Cosmetics, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646635960', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684650228', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/10-Burberry_1.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/10-Burberry.jpg']}]
description_en: The Burberry Boutique at HIA offers a stunning selection of ready-to-wear and outwear pieces, bags, accessories, and footwear. In addition, the boutique features a selection of the brand's signature pieces, including Lola and Olympia bags and classic cashmere scarves.
meta_tags: Burberry, Fashion, Clothing, Accessories, Fragrances, Perfumes, Sunglasses, Cosmetics, Designer Brands, Shop

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Emilio Pucci', 'mcn_body': '

Pucci at the Viale Del Lusso luxury avenue showcases an impressive collection of high-end Ladies' Handbags, wallets, ready-to-wear, and shoes. The Florence-based brand's swirling prints have brought life to resort-ready silhouettes since 1947, earning the brand's founder, Emilio Pucci, the title of "The Prince of Prints."

 

 

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646647715', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684650207', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/pucci_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/pucci.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'بوتشي', 'mcn_body': '

يعرض متجر بوتشي (Pucci) في وسط منطقة المتاجر الفاخرة فيالي دي لوسو في قلب مطار حمد الدولي مجموعة مذهلة من حقائب اليد النسائية والمحافظ الجاهزة والأحذية الراقية. ومن خلال طبعاتها الزخرفية الملتوية، أعادت العلامة التجارية الشهيرة التي تتخذ من فلورنسا مقراً لها الحياة إلى مواسم ملابس المنتجع منذ عام 1947، مما أكسب مؤسس العلامة التجارية، إميليو بوتشي، لقب "أمير الطبعات الزخرفية".

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1646647715', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684650207', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/pucci_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/pucci.jpg']}]
description_en: Pucci at the Viale Del Lusso luxury avenue showcases an impressive collection of high-end Ladies' Handbags, wallets, ready-to-wear, and shoes. The Florence-based brand's swirling prints have brought life to resort-ready silhouettes since 1947, earning the brand's founder, Emilio Pucci, the title of "The Prince of Prints."

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Joe & The Juice', 'mcn_body': "

The popular Danish juice and coffee shop located in the Northnode terminal offers an extensive variety of delicious juices, smoothies and coffee. Visit Joe and The Juice and order your perfect drink, whether it's the 'Herb Tonic' or just a 'Cup of Joe'.

Joe & The Juice also serves a tasty range of food. This includes a selection of toasted sandwiches and granola.

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1667290517', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684406060', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}, {'mcn_title': 'جو اند ذا جوس', 'mcn_body': '

 استمتع في المقهى الدنماركي الشهير جو  آند ذا جوس  ‏Joe & The Juice في الصالة الشمالية بمجموعة متنوعة من العصائر  الطازجة والمنعشة أو يمكنك التمتع باحتساء فنجاناً طازجاً من القهوة، كما يمكنك أيضاً الاستمتاع  بتناول مشروبك المفضل ، سواء كان "Herb Tonic" أو "Cup of Joe".

 يقدم  لك  جو  آند ذا جوس Joe & The Juice أيضًا مجموعة لذيذة من الأطعمة اللذيذة والساندويتشات والسلطات والشطائر المحمصة والجرانولا.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1667290539', 'mcn_modified_on': '1684406072', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}]
description_en:
The popular Danish juice and coffee shop located in the Northnode terminal offers an extensive variety of delicious juices, smoothies and coffee. Visit Joe and The Juice and order your perfect drink, whether it's the 'Herb Tonic' or just a 'Cup of Joe'.

Joe & The Juice also serves a tasty range of food. This includes a selection of toasted sandwiches and granola.
