mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Jones the Grocer Express', 'mcn_body': '

Jones the Grocer, the Australian gourmet grocer and café, serves its popular single orgin coffees, croissants, sandwiches, salads, soups and delicious mains. All items are made fresh daily and packaged for take away, perfect for passengers preparing to board their flights.  

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665402064', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480994', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108017_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108017.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'جونز ذا جروسر اكسبرس', 'mcn_body': '

"جونز ذا جروسر اكسبرس" هو مقهى ومحل بقالة استرالي غورميه  للذواقة، يقدم مجموعة متنوعة من مشروبات القهوة والكروسان والشطائر والسلطات والشوربات والأطباق الرئيسية. يتم تحضير جميع المكونات طازجة بشكل يومي، ومن ثم يتم تغليفها وتجهيزها للطلبات الخارجية، ما يجعل المقهى الخيار المثالي للمسافرين الذين يستعدون للصعود على متن الطائرة للانطلاق في رحلتهم القادمة.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665402078', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669791037', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108017_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108017.jpg']}]
description_en: Jones the Grocer, the Australian gourmet grocer and café, serves its popular single orgin coffees, croissants, sandwiches, salads, soups and delicious mains. All items are made fresh daily and packaged for take away, perfect for passengers preparing to board their flights.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Comptoir Libanais', 'mcn_body': '

Comptoir Libanais creates delicious, freshly prepared, Lebanese food in a vibrant and colourful enviroment. Its all-day menu mirrors a selection of hot and cold mezze alongside main dishes from the Lebanese Cuisine.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665402026', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480941', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108016_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108016.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'كونتوار ليبانيه', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم مطعم  كونتوار ليبانيه المأكولات اللبنانية اللذيذة والطازجة في بيئة مرحة نابضة بالحياة. وتعكس قائمة الطعام المقدمة على مدار اليوم مجموعة مختارة من المقبلات الساخنة والباردة إلى جانب تشكيلة من أبرز الأطباق الرئيسية التي يمتاز بها المطبخ اللبناني العريق.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665402041', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669790371', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108016_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108016.jpg']}]
description_en: Comptoir Libanais creates delicious, freshly prepared, Lebanese food in a vibrant and colourful enviroment. Its all-day menu mirrors a selection of hot and cold mezze alongside main dishes from the Lebanese Cuisine.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'La Brioche Dorée', 'mcn_body': '

Brioche Dorée means a delightful welcome in warm peaceful surroundings, a delicious haven where varied balanced food is always a treasure trove of authentic flavours.

Offering traditional food with a real French taste combining flavour and nutrition, adapted to different times of the day for eating on the spot or to take away.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659271460', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480675', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108014_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108014.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'لابريوش دوريه', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم مقهى ومخبز بريوش دوريه (Brioche Dorée) خدماته الرائعة في أجواء حميمية هادئة، ليكون ملاذاً للمسافرين يستمتعون فيه بخيارات متوازنة ومتنوعة من الأطباق ذات النكهات الأصيلة.
مأكولات تقليدية بمذاق فرنسي حقيقي يجمع بين النكهة والفائدة، ويتكيف مع أوقات اليوم المختلفة ليقدم خيارات الوجبات الداخلية أو الخارجية سريعة التحضير.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1660134057', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480701', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108014_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108014.jpg']}]
description_en:
Brioche Dorée means a delightful welcome in warm peaceful surroundings, a delicious haven where varied balanced food is always a treasure trove of authentic flavours.

Offering traditional food with a real French taste combining flavour and nutrition, adapted to different times of the day for eating on the spot or to take away.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Shawarma Station ', 'mcn_body': '

More than just Shawarma!

The name itself seems to be enough to make your mouth start watering. Shawarma is a Lebanese-style wrap with thin cuts of spit-roasted, seasoned chicken, beef and spicy sausage.

Deriving from traditional roots and with a twist of modern, the concept reflects the Arabic culture in various scenic representations. It took the heights of its potential, giving it new varieties and using only from the best ingredients.
The Show Kitchen is making its appearance displaying traditional street food being cooked while other meals add to the variety of choices that exist within the brand. The overall interior design approach features industrial materials such as metal meshes, bricks, cement rendered surfaces that showcases the authenticity of the meals being cooked. 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401540', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480507', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}, {'mcn_title': ' شاورما ستيشن ', 'mcn_body': '

أكثر من مجرد شاورما!
الاسم وحده كافٍ لجعل اللعاب يسيل. لفائف الخبز محضرة على الطريقة اللبنانية مع قطع رفيعة من الدجاج أو اللحم البقري أو السجق الحار المشوح على النار.
مفهوم الشاروما التقليدية مع لمسة عصرية أنيقة تعكس ثقافة الطهي العربية في أروع صورها، وترتقى بإمكاناتها إلى آفاق جديدة لتقدم أصنافاً مبتكرة محضرة من أفضل المكونات. ويتم في المطبخ المفتوح  طهي الطعام علناً  بالطرق التقليدية لتحضير أطباق الشوارع الشعبية فيما تضيف الوجبات الأخرى المزيد من الخيارات المتنوعة التي تقدمها  هذه العلامة التجارية. ويتميز التصميم الداخلي بالمواد الصناعية مثل الشبكات المعدنية والقرميد والأسطح الأسمنتية للدلالة على أصالة الوجبات التي يتم طهيها.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401558', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669788841', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': []}]
description_en:
More than just Shawarma!

The name itself seems to be enough to make your mouth start watering. Shawarma is a Lebanese-style wrap with thin cuts of spit-roasted, seasoned chicken, beef and spicy sausage.

Deriving from traditional roots and with a twist of modern, the concept reflects the Arabic culture in various scenic representations. It took the heights of its potential, giving it new varieties and using only from the best ingredients.
The Show Kitchen is making its appearance displaying traditional street food being cooked while other meals add to the variety of choices that exist within the brand. The overall interior design approach features industrial materials such as metal meshes, bricks, cement rendered surfaces that showcases the authenticity of the meals being cooked.

The design matches with the playful tastiness of the food offer served with the playful tastiness of the food offer served in a vibrant urban hangout.in a vibrant urban hangout.

كما يمكن للمسافرين أخذ طلباتهم والاستمتاع بتناول الوجبات الخفيفة أثناء التنقل مع القهوة عالية الجودة  تتناسب مع ما يفضله المسافرون.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401706', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669790502', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108011_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108011.jpg']}]

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Levito ', 'mcn_body': '

Levito offers travelers affordable, high quality Italian recipes in a contemporary, Italian setting. The kitchen serves up a deliciously tempting range of freshly prepared pizza and pasta dishes.

An all day menu celebrates our passion for everything Italian, with classic seasonal dishes made with the best ingredients. The atmosphere is defined by a layered variety of textures and materials that reflect a warm, natural and comfortable ambience.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401643', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480088', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108010_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108010.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'ليفيتو', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم مطعم ليفيتو للمسافرين وصفات إيطالية عالية الجودة وبأسعار معقولة في أجواء إيطالية معاصرة، مع مجموعة من مختلف أنواع البيتزا الطازجة وأطباق المعكرونة الشهية.

قائمة طعام على مدار الساعة تعكس شغفنا بكل ما هو إيطالي، مع أطباق موسمية كلاسيكية محضرة من أفضل المكونات، وأجواء حميمية دافئة وطبيعية ومريحة.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401660', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669791055', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108010_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%20108010.jpg']}]
description_en:
Levito offers travelers affordable, high quality Italian recipes in a contemporary, Italian setting. The kitchen serves up a deliciously tempting range of freshly prepared pizza and pasta dishes.

An all day menu celebrates our passion for everything Italian, with classic seasonal dishes made with the best ingredients. The atmosphere is defined by a layered variety of textures and materials that reflect a warm, natural and comfortable ambience.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Jaipur ', 'mcn_body': '

Indian cuisine is steeped in tradition, an amalgam of different ethnic influences, that are captured in the food offer of this concept. The Indian gastronomy is a banquet expressed in colors, smells, flavors and personalities, at same is the atmosphere this concept archives. Plausibly the most varied food culture in the world! The fast
portions and varied Indian recipes is an awakening taste stimulant, for any customer to try!

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401500', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667480040', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010809_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010809.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'جيبور ', 'mcn_body': '

حافظ المطبخ الهندي على ثقافات الطهي التقليدية الأصيلة، إذ يجمع في أطباقه مزيجاً من التأثيرات الإثنية المختلفة التي تظهر بوضوح في نكهاته الساحرة. ويتميز فن الطهي الهندي بمزيج متنوع من الألوان والروائح والنكهات والهويات، إلى جانب أجواءه الحميمة النابضة بالحياة. وبهذا، فقد يكون المطبخ الهندي المطبخ الأكثر تنوعاً في العالم!
تفضلوا بزياتنا والاستمتاع بخدماتنا السريعة ووصفاتنا الهندية المتنوعة والشهية في مطعم Jaipur!

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401516', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669789978', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010809_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010809.jpg']}]
description_en:
Indian cuisine is steeped in tradition, an amalgam of different ethnic influences, that are captured in the food offer of this concept. The Indian gastronomy is a banquet expressed in colors, smells, flavors and personalities, at same is the atmosphere this concept archives. Plausibly the most varied food culture in the world! The fast
portions and varied Indian recipes is an awakening taste stimulant, for any customer to try!

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Food Market', 'mcn_body': '

The food court offers accessibly priced mix of cuisines from Indian to other Asian to Middle Eastern and international fast food favourites, plus a gelato unit.The Food Market includes international fast-food chains such as Burger King and KFC along with many other local offerings.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401315', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667479105', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010806_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010806.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'فود ماركت', 'mcn_body': '

تقدم قاعة الطعام في السوق الحرة القطرية مزيجاً متنوعاً من الاختيارات يشمل المطاعم الهندية والآسيوية والشرق أوسطية ومطاعم الوجبات السريعة المفضلة عالمياً، بالإضافة إلى المحال المتخصصة ببيع الأيس كريم. كما تضم قاعة الطعام سلاسل الوجبات السريعة العالمية مثل برجر كنج وكنتاكي إلى جانب العديد من المطاعم المحلية.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1665401334', 'mcn_modified_on': '1669790491', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010806_0.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/1920%20x%2010806.jpg']}]
description_en: The food court offers accessibly priced mix of cuisines from Indian to other Asian to Middle Eastern and international fast food favourites, plus a gelato unit.The Food Market includes international fast-food chains such as Burger King and KFC along with many other local offerings.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Starbucks', 'mcn_body': '

Flying is fun but it can also be tiring, we know. Sometimes, all you need is a cosy corner to lounge and relax with a cup of your favourite coffee!

At Starbucks, not only are we passionate to offer you a phenomenal cup of coffee with hand-picked whole beans skillfully roasted and brewed, we strive to create a comfortable third place away from work and home, where you can relax and enjoy a sense of community.

The Starbucks Experience is more than a cup of coffee. It’s the happy smiles of our baristas whenever we see you in our coffee shops, the aroma of fresh coffee with your name on it and a variety of products for you to enjoy whether in-store, on route to your flight, or at home. Our mission is to nurture and inspire the human spirit - one person, one cup and one neighbourhood at a time.

While we take pride in our coffee, we also offer a choice of iced beverages, teas, sandwiches, cakes, salad and more - a perfect treat for your flight.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1667287604', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667389560', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/SBX_Banner_Image_1920x1080px_01.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/SBX_Banner_Image_1920x1080px_01_0.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'ستاربكس', 'mcn_body': '

على الرغم من المتعة الكبيرة التي ينطوي عليها السفر جواً، إلا أنه قد يكون تجربة متعبة في الوقت نفسه. وفي بعض الأحيان، كل ما تحتاجه هو ركن مريح تأوي إليه للاستراحة والاسترخاء مع فنجان من قهوتك المفضلة!

في ستاربكس (Starbucks)، نعمل جاهدين لخلق مكان مريح لضيوفنا بعيداً عن أجواء المنزل والعمل، لنقدم لهم فنجاناً رائعاً من القهوة مع حبوب البن الكاملة المنتقاة بعناية وحب، والمحمصة والمُخمرة بمهارة عالية، ليتمكنوا من الاسترخاء والاستمتاع بالراحة في جو عائلي مرحب.

تقدم ستاربكس تجربة تذوق تتجاوز المألوف، تؤكدها لكم بشاشة وجه الباريستا عندما زيارتكم لنا المقهى، ورائحة القهوة الطازجة، ومجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات لتستمتعوا بها سواء في المتجر أو أثناء رحلتكم أو في المنزل. مهمتنا هي رعاية وإلهام الروح البشرية - شخص واحد وكوب واحد وحي واحد في كل مرة.

وإلى جانب قهوتنا التي نفخر بها، نقدم أيضاً مجموعة مختارة من المشروبات المثلجة والشاي والسندويشات والكيك والسلطات وغير ذلك لتكون الرفيق المثالي لكم أثناء السفر.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1667287877', 'mcn_modified_on': '1667389492', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/SBX_Banner_Image_1920x1080px_01.jpg', 'https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/SBX_Banner_Image_1920x1080px_01_0.jpg']}]
description_en:
Flying is fun but it can also be tiring, we know. Sometimes, all you need is a cosy corner to lounge and relax with a cup of your favourite coffee!

At Starbucks, not only are we passionate to offer you a phenomenal cup of coffee with hand-picked whole beans skillfully roasted and brewed, we strive to create a comfortable third place away from work and home, where you can relax and enjoy a sense of community.

The Starbucks Experience is more than a cup of coffee. It’s the happy smiles of our baristas whenever we see you in our coffee shops, the aroma of fresh coffee with your name on it and a variety of products for you to enjoy whether in-store, on route to your flight, or at home. Our mission is to nurture and inspire the human spirit - one person, one cup and one neighbourhood at a time.

While we take pride in our coffee, we also offer a choice of iced beverages, teas, sandwiches, cakes, salad and more - a perfect treat for your flight.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Tag Heuer', 'mcn_body': '

TAG Heuer, is the Swiss Avant-Garde watchmaker since 1860. Avant-garde is in our culture and philosophy. Our unique heritage is built on pushing boundaries and breaking rules: harnessing mental fortitude to overcome technology restraints and create daring luxury watches with real racing spirit and a performance touch. The brand has marked the history of watchmaking, especially in the field of chronographs with an unequalled mechanical accuracy.

TAG Heuer is part a Branch of LVMH Swiss Manufactures

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'TAG Heuer, Watches, Luxury Watches, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646639050', 'mcn_modified_on': '1666764931', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_tag.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'تاغ هوير ', 'mcn_body': '

تاغ هوير (TAG Heuer) هي دار ساعات سويسرية رائدة، تأسست في 1860 لتصبح منذ ذلك الحين في طليعة دور الساعات العالمية. فالريادة كامنة في جوهر ثقافتنا وفلسفتنا، وتأسس تراثنا الفريد على تجاوز الحدود وكسر القيود، والاستفادة من الطاقات العقلية للتغلب على قيود التكنولوجيا وابتكار ساعات فاخرة جريئة مفعمة بروح السباقات الحماسية ولمسات الأداء الراقي. لقد تركت العلامة التجارية بصمتها المميزة في تاريخ صناعة الساعات، لا سيما في مجال أجهزة قياس الوقت (الكرونوغراف) حيث تميز بدقة ميكانيكية لا مثيل لها.

TAG Heuer جزء من فرع مجموعة LVMH Swiss Manufactures.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'TAG Heuer, Watches, Luxury Watches, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646639050', 'mcn_modified_on': '1666764931', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_tag.jpg']}]
description_en:
TAG Heuer, is the Swiss Avant-Garde watchmaker since 1860. Avant-garde is in our culture and philosophy. Our unique heritage is built on pushing boundaries and breaking rules: harnessing mental fortitude to overcome technology restraints and create daring luxury watches with real racing spirit and a performance touch. The brand has marked the history of watchmaking, especially in the field of chronographs with an unequalled mechanical accuracy.

TAG Heuer is part a Branch of LVMH Swiss Manufactures
meta_tags: TAG Heuer, Watches, Luxury Watches, Designer Brands, Shop

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Spizzico', 'mcn_body': "

Spizzico was founded in 1989, and it represents Autogrill's all Italian answer to the spread of the US formula of quick service. In just over 30 years, it has established itself among Italians as a familiar place for a quick and tasty pizza snack. It brings Italian tradition to a modern audience, seamlessly harmonizing its brand with passenger’s needs whilst giving them something extra that comes from real culinary expertise.

\r\n", 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Spizzico', 'mcn_created_on': '1656405033', 'mcn_modified_on': '1666512989', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/mi_spizzico_0.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'سبازيو', 'mcn_body': '

أسست سلسلة مطاعم Autogrill الإيطالية الشهيرة مطعم سبازيو للبيتزا (Spizzico) في عام 1989 لمواجهة انتشار مطاعم الوجبات السريعة الأمريكية. وخلال ما يزيد بقليل عن 30 عاماً، رسخ المطعم مكانته بين الإيطاليين كمكان مألوف لتناول وجبة بيتزا سريعة وشهية. يُعرّف المطعم الجيل الجديد على التقاليد الإيطالية، ويوائم ما يقدمه من وجبات بسلاسة مع احتياجات المسافرين، مع نكهات مميزة تؤكد ما يتميز به من خبرات عريقة.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Spizzico', 'mcn_created_on': '1660137835', 'mcn_modified_on': '1693289643', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/mi_spizzico_0.jpg']}]
description_en: Spizzico was founded in 1989, and it represents Autogrill's all Italian answer to the spread of the US formula of quick service. In just over 30 years, it has established itself among Italians as a familiar place for a quick and tasty pizza snack. It brings Italian tradition to a modern audience, seamlessly harmonizing its brand with passenger’s needs whilst giving them something extra that comes from real culinary expertise.
meta_tags: Spizzico

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Untitled by Rudolf Stingel', 'mcn_body': '

Italian artist Rudolf Stingel often invites audiences to interact with his work, extending the artistic process and allowing his artwork to develop as ‘collaborations’. Since the 1980s, Stingel has been interrogating the medium by seeking audience participation in his projects using unlikely materials to question notions of authenticity and hierarchy.


Casting and plating graffiti covered insulation panels has become one of Stingel’s acclaimed styles since early 2007. His latest addition to the airport celebrates and honors all the workers who helped build the airport. Signatures and initials of some workers are engraved in the body of the artwork.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1639377379', 'mcn_modified_on': '1666246741', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Untitled%20by%20Rudolf.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'بدون عنوان', 'mcn_body': '

غالبا ما يدعو الفنان الإيطالي الجمهور للتفاعل مع عمله، موسعًا أطراف العملية الفنية، ومتيحًا بذلك الفرصة لتطوير عمله الفني في إطار من "التعاون" مع الجمهور. ومنذ عام 1980، اعتاد ستينجيل على إثارة النقاش حول المواد الفنية المستخدمة في أعماله، حيث يستخدم مواد غير مألوفة للتشكيك في مفاهيم الأصالة والتسلسل الهرمي. ومن أبرز الأساليب التي عُرف بها ستينجل منذ مطلع عام 2007 ألواح العزل المغطاة بجرافيتي عن طريق الصب والطلاء. التوقيعات والحروف الأولى المحفورة في جسد العمل الفني تنتمي للعمال الذي شاركوا في صناعة العمل.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1660131243', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660131256', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Untitled%20by%20Rudolf.jpg']}]
description_en:
Italian artist Rudolf Stingel often invites audiences to interact with his work, extending the artistic process and allowing his artwork to develop as ‘collaborations’. Since the 1980s, Stingel has been interrogating the medium by seeking audience participation in his projects using unlikely materials to question notions of authenticity and hierarchy.


Casting and plating graffiti covered insulation panels has become one of Stingel’s acclaimed styles since early 2007. His latest addition to the airport celebrates and honors all the workers who helped build the airport. Signatures and initials of some workers are engraved in the body of the artwork.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Flying Man By Dia Al-Azzawi', 'mcn_body': "

In the first sculpture the artist Dia Azzawi has taken the story of Bin Firnas, a historical figure from the Islamic world who was an early pioneer in experimenting with flight, as the basis for a monument to modern air travel. Keeping with the artist's practice of reactivating historical forms as contemporary means of expression, the sculpture has a cylindrical form inspired by the obelisks that appeared in Mesopotamia in third century B.C.


The second sculpture is inspired by historical figure Armen Firman.
One day in 852 AD, before a crowd of spectators, Armen Firman climbed to the top of the minaret of the Great Mosque in Cordoba, for an experiment. He wanted to test a new machine that he had built based upon an elementary comprehension of the mechanics of flight gained from observations of nature. It consisted of a silk cloak reinforced with wooden rods in order to form wings. When Firman jumped from the minaret, he did not fly, yet neither did he fall. Rather, the silk wings filled with air, which slowed his descent to the ground.

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1639381813', 'mcn_modified_on': '1666246729', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Flying%20man.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'الرجل الطائر', 'mcn_body': '

يأخذ العمل شكل أسطوانتين مرتفعتين استلهمهما العزاوي من الأعمدة التي اشتهر بها الفن المعماري في بلاد الرافدين في القرن الثالث قبل الميلاد.

العمل الأول مستلهم من الشخصية التاريخية الشهيرة في العالم الإسلاميّ "عباس بن فرناس" الذي يعد من الرواد الأوائل في محاولات الطيران.

 والعمل الثاني مستلهم من الشخصية التاريخية أرمن فيرمان، الذي قفز من أعلى قمة مسجد قرطبة في عام 852 هجرية لتجربة أداة الطيران الجديدة التي ابتكرها، وكانت عباءة من الحرير مزودة بأجنحة من الأعمدة الخشبية. وقد فشلت محاولته في التحليق غير أنه لم يسقط على الأرض مباشرة، بل نزل ببطء بسبب امتلاء عباءته الحريرية بالهواء والتي جنبته الارتطام الشديد بالأرض.

ويهدف العزاوي من هذين العملين إلى الاحتفاء بفكرة السفر في العصر الحديث.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1660131348', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660131366', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Flying%20man.jpg']}]
description_en:
In the first sculpture the artist Dia Azzawi has taken the story of Bin Firnas, a historical figure from the Islamic world who was an early pioneer in experimenting with flight, as the basis for a monument to modern air travel. Keeping with the artist's practice of reactivating historical forms as contemporary means of expression, the sculpture has a cylindrical form inspired by the obelisks that appeared in Mesopotamia in third century B.C.


The second sculpture is inspired by historical figure Armen Firman.
One day in 852 AD, before a crowd of spectators, Armen Firman climbed to the top of the minaret of the Great Mosque in Cordoba, for an experiment. He wanted to test a new machine that he had built based upon an elementary comprehension of the mechanics of flight gained from observations of nature. It consisted of a silk cloak reinforced with wooden rods in order to form wings. When Firman jumped from the minaret, he did not fly, yet neither did he fall. Rather, the silk wings filled with air, which slowed his descent to the ground.

[{'mcn_title': 'Kenzo', 'mcn_body': '

Leading by example, we remain committed to the environment through our #UseTheExisting philosophy, as we promise to revolutionize our supply chain and make the dream of zero waste possible.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659249205', 'mcn_modified_on': '1665907090', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Kenzo%20480x270.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'كنزو', 'mcn_body': '

ولأنها تعتبر نفسها قدوة للآخرين، تؤكد زينيا على التزامها بالبيئة من خلال فلسفتها المتمحورة حول استخدام الموجود حالياً (#UseTheExisting)، حيث تعد بإحداث ثورة في سلسلة التوريد الخاصة بها وتحقيق الحلم المتمثل بعالم خال من النفايات.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659249205', 'mcn_modified_on': '1665907090', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Kenzo%20480x270.jpg']}]
description_en: Leading by example, we remain committed to the environment through our #UseTheExisting philosophy, as we promise to revolutionize our supply chain and make the dream of zero waste possible.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Qatar Duty Free Perfumes & Cosmetics Store', 'mcn_body': '

The most amazing brands await you in our new shop dedicated to perfume and cosmetics. Visit the multiple counters to discover unique fragrances and international cosmetics brands including L’Oréal, Givenchy, Chanel, Dior, Lancôme, YSL, Prada, Guerlain, Armani. mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Hamad International Airport Displays an Impressive Ongoing Momentum in Passenger Growth', 'mcn_body': '

In 2014, Qatar opened its brand-new airport with the intention to redefine the future of airport operations and compete with the best airports in the world. By the end of 2019, Hamad International Airport (HIA) had served 38,786,422 passengers, which was the most it had reserved in a single year.

The same year that HIA announced its highest passenger traffic to date, the airport announced its multi-phased expansion plan, increasing the airport’s capacity to more than 58 million passengers annually in Phase A of the project, and increasing the capacity further to more than 60 million passengers per annum after the completion of phase B .

The following year of 2022 began achieving strong passenger numbers, with HIA announcing that it efficiently served a record high influx of passengers during the winter holiday peak period, handling one million passengers in the first week of January 2020, marking the average of 138,649 passengers in a 24-hour period, which is the most number of passengers handled in a single day. During this period of high passenger influx, HIA went above and beyond maintaining high standards of passenger experience and operational excellence to successfully reducing queuing times at key touchpoints of the airport, with average wait times as low as 1 minute 20 seconds at transfer security and 2 minutes 24 seconds at arrival immigration.

While HIA’s impressive passenger traffic flows were interrupted by the worldwide impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, Qatar’s aviation hub was one of the very few airports which never halted operations. As a result, HIA announced in the first quarter of 2020 an increase of 4.7 percent in the global hub’s cargo activity in comparison to the same quarter the previous year. Cargo handling included the transportation of urgent medical relief aid and humanitarian assistance, which at the time was immensely needed to fight against the COVID-19 pandemic.

2021 saw HIA rapidly recovering its passenger figures after the pandemic slump. The airport witnessed a 41.37 per cent increase in the number of passengers served in 2021 compared to 2020, with a total of 17,702,635 passengers. It became clear that HIA’s safe and precautionary measures put in place during the pandemic and its business continuity plans were instrumental in restoring confidence its passengers to resort back to air travel.

2021 was also the year that HIA ranked the number one airport in the world by the Skytrax World Airport Awards 2021. It also won the Best Airport in the Middle East and the Best Airport to 25 to 35 million Passengers category.

In 2022, the first quarter of the year, HIA witnessed a strong increase in passenger traffic, with a 162 percent surge compared to the same period in 2021. A total of 7.14 million passengers in the first quarter of 2022 were recorded, with 2,163,086 passengers in January, 2,168,265 passengers in February and 2,812,874 passengers in March 2022. HIA also introduced three new passenger destinations in Q1 of 2022, including RwandAir’s direct flights from Kigali, as well as new direct routes between Algiers and Doha at the rate of two flights per week every Thursday and Saturday. In total, HIA had 36 airline partners during Q1 of 2022.

After sustaining its position as the world’s best airport for the second year in a row by Skytrax, HIA’s passenger traffic numbers continued to grow stronger during the second quarter of 2022, showing a return to pre-COVID levels. HIA served a total of 2.5 million passengers in the month of April, 2.8 million passengers in May and 3.1 million passengers in June, which is a total of 8.42 million passengers served in the second quarter of 2022.

The average monthly passenger throughput for Q2 2022 showcased an 18 per cent increase in comparison to the first quarter of 2022. The passenger transfer percentage also grew by 16 percent this quarter over last year, and the number of outbound local passengers in Q2 was 47 percent higher than in Q1. The number of inbound passengers increased by 7 percent in comparison to Q1.

With more than 100,000 daily passengers and over 3 million passengers in a single month, HIA expects to end this year on an extremely positive note. Passenger numbers are still expected to grow further, with new airlines joining Qatar’s expanding aviation hub. Alongside new concepts, renowned brand stores as well as internationally recognized food and beverage outlets – HIA continues to be the go-to destination for millions of global travelers.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1664778208', 'mcn_modified_on': '1664778376', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/basic-pages/Lamp%20Bear.jpeg']}]
mcn_title_en: Hamad International Airport Displays an Impressive Ongoing Momentum in Passenger Growth
description_en:
In 2014, Qatar opened its brand-new airport with the intention to redefine the future of airport operations and compete with the best airports in the world. By the end of 2019, Hamad International Airport (HIA) had served 38,786,422 passengers, which was the most it had reserved in a single year.

The same year that HIA announced its highest passenger traffic to date, the airport announced its multi-phased expansion plan, increasing the airport’s capacity to more than 58 million passengers annually in Phase A of the project, and increasing the capacity further to more than 60 million passengers per annum after the completion of phase B .

The following year of 2022 began achieving strong passenger numbers, with HIA announcing that it efficiently served a record high influx of passengers during the winter holiday peak period, handling one million passengers in the first week of January 2020, marking the average of 138,649 passengers in a 24-hour period, which is the most number of passengers handled in a single day. During this period of high passenger influx, HIA went above and beyond maintaining high standards of passenger experience and operational excellence to successfully reducing queuing times at key touchpoints of the airport, with average wait times as low as 1 minute 20 seconds at transfer security and 2 minutes 24 seconds at arrival immigration.

While HIA’s impressive passenger traffic flows were interrupted by the worldwide impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, Qatar’s aviation hub was one of the very few airports which never halted operations. As a result, HIA announced in the first quarter of 2020 an increase of 4.7 percent in the global hub’s cargo activity in comparison to the same quarter the previous year. Cargo handling included the transportation of urgent medical relief aid and humanitarian assistance, which at the time was immensely needed to fight against the COVID-19 pandemic.

2021 saw HIA rapidly recovering its passenger figures after the pandemic slump. The airport witnessed a 41.37 per cent increase in the number of passengers served in 2021 compared to 2020, with a total of 17,702,635 passengers. It became clear that HIA’s safe and precautionary measures put in place during the pandemic and its business continuity plans were instrumental in restoring confidence its passengers to resort back to air travel.

2021 was also the year that HIA ranked the number one airport in the world by the Skytrax World Airport Awards 2021. It also won the Best Airport in the Middle East and the Best Airport to 25 to 35 million Passengers category.

In 2022, the first quarter of the year, HIA witnessed a strong increase in passenger traffic, with a 162 percent surge compared to the same period in 2021. A total of 7.14 million passengers in the first quarter of 2022 were recorded, with 2,163,086 passengers in January, 2,168,265 passengers in February and 2,812,874 passengers in March 2022. HIA also introduced three new passenger destinations in Q1 of 2022, including RwandAir’s direct flights from Kigali, as well as new direct routes between Algiers and Doha at the rate of two flights per week every Thursday and Saturday. In total, HIA had 36 airline partners during Q1 of 2022.

After sustaining its position as the world’s best airport for the second year in a row by Skytrax, HIA’s passenger traffic numbers continued to grow stronger during the second quarter of 2022, showing a return to pre-COVID levels. HIA served a total of 2.5 million passengers in the month of April, 2.8 million passengers in May and 3.1 million passengers in June, which is a total of 8.42 million passengers served in the second quarter of 2022.

The average monthly passenger throughput for Q2 2022 showcased an 18 per cent increase in comparison to the first quarter of 2022. The passenger transfer percentage also grew by 16 percent this quarter over last year, and the number of outbound local passengers in Q2 was 47 percent higher than in Q1. The number of inbound passengers increased by 7 percent in comparison to Q1.

With more than 100,000 daily passengers and over 3 million passengers in a single month, HIA expects to end this year on an extremely positive note. Passenger numbers are still expected to grow further, with new airlines joining Qatar’s expanding aviation hub. Alongside new concepts, renowned brand stores as well as internationally recognized food and beverage outlets – HIA continues to be the go-to destination for millions of global travelers.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Hamad International Airport Announces Special Preparations for the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ ', 'mcn_body': '

The State of Qatar’s preparations for the FIFA World Cup is in full swing as the country gets ready to host one of the world’s largest sporting events. Being held from 20 November until 18 December across seven different municipalities, Qatar will be recognized as the first Arab country to host the coveted tournament. Ultra-modern new stadiums and hotels are spread across the country, alongside a growing infrastructure for the country’s transportation and futuristic technology being implemented within the rising venues. This leaves the world wondering, how is the official airport partner of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ preparing to welcome around 1.8 million visitors, the wide majority of which will be arriving by air?

MATAR, the Qatar Company for Airports Operation and Management, operates two international airports in Qatar. Its main aviation hub, the award-winning Hamad International Airport (HIA, IATA code: DOH) and its companion Doha International Airport (IATA code: DIA), with a robust Airport Operations Plan, a dedicated Event Management Center and well trained and motivated staff, Qatar’s airports are ready to welcome the world through its gates.

Understanding Passenger Demographics and Peak Periods

The commonality for the love of sports between all the diverse visitors will be extremely evident, with visitors estimated by the Host Country to come from various continents, including 37 percent from the GCC, 26 percent from Europe, 11 percent from the Middle East, 8 percent from North America, 8 percent from Asia, 6 percent from Latin America, and 4 percent from Africa.

The Host Country, has mapped out peak arrival and departure days for passenger traffic, with peak arrivals expected on the first day, while peak departures expected on the 12th day. It has also categorized passenger groups arriving in Qatar for the FIFA World Cup that include teams, referees, media, dignitaries and spectators, and mapped out passenger flow for each category.

The Airports Operations Plan

MATAR, the Qatar Company for Airports Operation and Management, also formulated the Airports Operations Plan (AOP) which has been a live document for many years, and the final edition has been issued in June 2022. All the plans for airport operations during the tournament have been thoroughly tested during the FIFA Arab Cup 2021 and have also been peer reviewed by aviation authority bodies and organizations who have previously hosted similar scale events.

The AOP defines in detail every process and procedure in place for the smooth delivery of the FIFA World Cup. For example, the types of passengers expected to enter Qatar through HIA and DIA are defined, and their travel journey-arriving and departing- has been carefully mapped out to ensure all visitors have the smoothest experience through the airport and into the city. 

Seamless alignment and communication between all stakeholders have been ensured through the AOP, while the roles and responsibilities of all airport stakeholders have been defined as well so there is clarity among all parties on expectations regarding service delivery. The plan also defines FIFA 2022 organizer’s responsibilities to ensure seamless teamwork of airport stakeholders and FIFA organizers. They have been working together for years to deliver a successful event.

Furthermore, the AOP covers coordination with all transport providers to ensure proper connectivity from and to the airport, the city and the stadiums. Coordination between traffic police, security, taxi and coach operators, metro etc. has also been mapped out, and continuous coordination is taking place in order to ensure full alignment. Travel processes such as check-in, immigration, security, boarding, and baggage handling flow were also included and carefully dissected in the AOP.

Event Management Center

Meanwhile, MATAR has established an Event Management Centre (EMC), dedicated for all World Cup related airport operations at Hamad International Airport and its companion Doha International Airport (DIA). It will be manned 24/7 by a diverse group of professionals representing all major airport stakeholders and partners to ensure a smooth flow of traffic and other operations related to the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™. The EMC has been established for accurate collection of required data, precise handling of information flows, coordination of landside and airside processes and quick and on-the-spot decision-making. The EMC has been successfully tested during the FIFA Arab Cup 2021.

Training and Development

HIA, with its various components and stakeholders, will be participating in a learning and development plan aiming at preparing the different teams to welcome the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ visitors. The plan will cover various aspects of passengers and resources handling – where all airport internal and external teams will be aligned on the performance objectives during the event’s period.

Readiness of the country’s aviation community will be undoubtedly sensed as the learning and development plan has been ongoing for a long time and will provide additional knowledge on how to operate and maintain the new facilities and technologies where applicable. The plan will also work on how to facilitate adaptation to the new procedures and systems, as well as give knowledge on airport layout, accessibility and working environment during the event. Training includes procedure trainings, on-job training, corporate training, soft skills training, familiarization training and customer service training.

The Airport Expansion

Titled the “Best Airport in the World” for the second year in a row by the prestigious Skytrax World Airport Awards 2022, HIA’s airport expansion is set to be revealed to the world very soon. The airport’s phase A expansion, set to be launched imminently, will increase the capacity to over 58 million passengers per annum. This phase includes the enhancement of HIA’s central concourse built in the North Plaza of the terminal. The central concourse will house world renowned luxury retail brands, concept stores and restaurants, all set around a 10,000 sqm indoor tropical garden and 268 sqm water feature, under a dramatic grid shell roof structure that lets in natural sunlight.HIA’s Phase B expansion will then begin in early 2023 and will boost the capacity to over 60 million passengers – cementing HIA as a major global hub and an extraordinary destination for millions of travelers.

MATAR and its two airports, Hamad International Airport and Doha International Airport, are ready to welcome the world through its gates and deliver a safe, seamless and pleasurable experience.

Titled the “Best Airport in the World” for the second year in a row by the prestigious Skytrax World Airport Awards 2022, HIA’s airport expansion is set to be revealed to the world very soon. This phase includes the enhancement of HIA’s central concourse built in the North Plaza of the terminal. The central concourse will house world renowned luxury retail brands, concept stores and restaurants, all set around a 10,000 sqm indoor tropical garden and 268 sqm water feature, under a dramatic grid shell roof structure that lets in natural sunlight.HIA’s Phase B expansion will then begin in early 2023 and will boost the capacity to over 60 million passengers – cementing HIA as a major global hub and an extraordinary destination for millions of travelers.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'A Look Inside Hamad International Airport’s Impressive Growth Plan', 'mcn_body': "

Doha’s Hamad International Airport (HIA), known for being Qatar’s main air link to the world, represents a new era for the international aviation community with its architecturally stunning, supremely efficient operations and truly welcoming staff. Built on Qatar's vision to create a world-class airport fit to become a leader in the aviation industry, the existing terminal has admirably served the country since the official opening of HIA in 2014.

Ten years ago, just over 5 million people a year passed through HIA. Currently, the airport serves over 165 destinations and over 30 million passengers per annum – as projections show that the number will further increase with the upcoming FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ tournament. Travellers entering HIA will witness an upgrade in the space, as the world’s best airport will be unveiling their long-awaited expansion project this October 2022.

HIA’s expansion consists of Phase A and B. Phase A of the expansion comprises of the enhancement of HIA’s central concourse built in the North Plaza of the terminal. The central concourse will house world renowned luxury retail brands, concept stores and restaurants, all set around a 10,000 sqm indoor tropical garden and 268 sqm water feature, under a dramatic grid shell roof structure that lets in natural sunlight. Construction of phase A began in early 2020 and aims to increase the airport’s capacity to more than 58 million passengers annually by October 2022. Phase B, which will begin in early 2023, will further enhance the airport’s capacity to more than 60 million passengers annually.

One of the many new experiences that are part of HIA’s airport expansion project include the “Oryx Garden Hotel”, the second airport hotel in the premises, which opened in September of this year. Situated in the North Plaza, this is the latest venue where passengers can unwind during a layover.

Meanwhile, the Al Mourjan lounge, the Qatar Airways Business Class lounge at HIA, will open an additional 9,000 sqm of the lounge at the airport terminal’s North Plaza, as part of the expansion project. The lounge, which is a benchmark for world class lounges, will feature new spas, a fitness arena, restaurants, and business centers for passengers to unwind and enjoy.

Ranked as the “Best Airport in the World” for the second consecutive year by the prestigious Skytrax World Airport Awards, as well as “Best Airport in the Middle East” title for the eighth year in a row, HIA continues to look for innovative solutions to further improve its sustainability goals. From refreshing greenery to a whole new world of exotic flora, the latest development at HIA will be the first airport in the MENA region to achieve a 4-star Global Sustainability Assessment System (GSAS) rating, a performance-based system for rating green buildings and infrastructure.

As the aviation industry continues to grow, HIA continues to reach new heights as it plans for yet another successful year. With the aim of winning the world's best airport award for the third time in a row, and as the Official Airport Partner of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™, HIA is fully geared to welcome the world to a destination extraordinaire.

", 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1664778064', 'mcn_modified_on': '1664778264', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/basic-pages/HIA%20Expansion%20Rendering_lower%20res.jpeg']}]

Phase B, which will begin in early 2023, will further enhance the airport’s capacity to more than 60 million passengers annually.

One of the many new experiences that are part of HIA’s airport expansion project include the “Oryx Garden Hotel”, the second airport hotel in the premises, which opened in September of this year. Situated in the North Plaza, this is the latest venue where passengers can unwind during a layover.

Meanwhile, the Al Mourjan lounge, the Qatar Airways Business Class lounge at HIA, will open an additional 9,000 sqm of the lounge at the airport terminal’s North Plaza, as part of the expansion project. The lounge, which is a benchmark for world class lounges, will feature new spas, a fitness arena, restaurants, and business centers for passengers to unwind and enjoy.

Ranked as the “Best Airport in the World” for the second consecutive year by the prestigious Skytrax World Airport Awards, as well as “Best Airport in the Middle East” title for the eighth year in a row, HIA continues to look for innovative solutions to further improve its sustainability goals. From refreshing greenery to a whole new world of exotic flora, the latest development at HIA will be the first airport in the MENA region to achieve a 4-star Global Sustainability Assessment System (GSAS) rating, a performance-based system for rating green buildings and infrastructure.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Harrods', 'mcn_body': '

The only two Harrods Signature store in the Middle East,one adjacent to the iconic Lamp Bear and the other closer to the travel gates, featuring a a range of carefully selected items, including timeless favourites such as Harrods bags, wallets, accessories and food gifting. Harrods gifting products, such as the iconic Harrods shopping bags and the legendary Harrods bear, are renowned across the world. Since the store first opened in 1849, Harrods has had a reputation for excellence. Satisfying and exceeding the expectations of our customers is paramount; the uncompromising service and exceptional merchandise, found within the store, contributes to the unique identity and international acclaim Harrods enjoys today.

Whilst proud of an incredibly rich history, we remain at the forefront of new trends, innovation and style. Attracting customers from around the world, the iconic department store, owned by Qatar Holding, continues to surpass the expectations of its visitors worldwide.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Harrods, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Souvenirs, Food, Cosmetics, Shoes, Accessories, Watches, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1659257253', 'mcn_modified_on': '1664354106', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_harrods.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': ' هارودز', 'mcn_body': '

يضم مطار حمد الدولي المتجرين الوحيدين من متاجر العلامة التجارية المرموقة هارودز (Harrods) في الشرق الأوسط. يقع المتجر الأول بالقرب من دمية الدب المصباح  الشهيرةـ، فيما يقع الآخر بالقرب من بوابات السفر. ويضم المتجران مجموعة من المنتجات الفاخرة المختارة بعناية، بما في ذلك المنتجات المفضلة الخالدة مثل الحقائب والمحافظ والإكسسوارات وهدايا الطعام. تشتهر منتجات الهدايا من هارودز، مثل حقائب تسوق هارودز الشهيرة ودب هارودز الأسطوري، في جميع أنحاء العالم. ومنذ افتتاح المتجر لأول مرة في عام 1849، اشتهر هارودز بالتميز. وتساهم جودة الخدمة التي تقدمها والبضائع الاستثنائية الموجودة داخل المتجر في تشكيل الهوية الفريدة للعلامة التجارية والشهرة الدولية التي تتمتع بها هارودز اليوم.

بينما نفخر بتاريخنا الغني الفريد من نوعه، نعلم بأننا لا نزال في طليعة الاتجاهات الجديدة والابتكار والأسلوب. ولا يزال المتجر الأيقوني المملوك لشركة قطر القابضة، الذي يستقطب العملاء من جميع أنحاء العالم، يفوق توقعات زواره في جميع أنحاء العالم كل مرة.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Harrods, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Souvenirs, Food, Cosmetics, Shoes, Accessories, Watches, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1659257253', 'mcn_modified_on': '1664354106', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_harrods.jpg']}]
description_en:
The only two Harrods Signature store in the Middle East,one adjacent to the iconic Lamp Bear and the other closer to the travel gates, featuring a a range of carefully selected items, including timeless favourites such as Harrods bags, wallets, accessories and food gifting. Harrods gifting products, such as the iconic Harrods shopping bags and the legendary Harrods bear, are renowned across the world. Since the store first opened in 1849, Harrods has had a reputation for excellence. Satisfying and exceeding the expectations of our customers is paramount; the uncompromising service and exceptional merchandise, found within the store, contributes to the unique identity and international acclaim Harrods enjoys today.

Whilst proud of an incredibly rich history, we remain at the forefront of new trends, innovation and style. Attracting customers from around the world, the iconic department store, owned by Qatar Holding, continues to surpass the expectations of its visitors worldwide.
meta_tags: Harrods, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Souvenirs, Food, Cosmetics, Shoes, Accessories, Watches, Designer Brands, Shop

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Swarovski', 'mcn_body': '

Since its foundation in 1895, Swarovski is synonymous with craftsmanship, precision and innovation. Its unique know-how has made the company shine as the worldwide cut crystal reference, 
delighting consumers with desirable and sparkling creations. Showing the creativity that lies at the heart of the company, Swarovski’s own brand lines of jewelry, watches and accessories are 
sold through more than 2 200 retail outlets worldwide.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Swarovski, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Crystals, Watches, Fashion, Accessories, Necklaces, Bracelets, Rings, Pendants, Earrings, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646639753', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660136903', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_swarovski.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'شواروفسكي', 'mcn_body': '

منذ تأسيسها في عام 1895، أصبحت سواروفسكي (Swarovski) عنواناً رديفاً للحرفية والدقة والابتكار. وتألقت الشركة بفضل خبرتها الاستثنائية لتصبح الوجهة الرئيسية للكريستال في جميع أنحاء العالم، وتبهر عملاءها بالإبداعات الجميلة والمتألقة لمنتجات العلامة التجارية الشهيرة من المجوهرات والساعات والإكسسوارات والتي تباع عبر أكثر من 2200 متجر للبيع بالتجزئة حول العالم.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Swarovski, Jewellery, Luxury Gifts, Crystals, Watches, Fashion, Accessories, Necklaces, Bracelets, Rings, Pendants, Earrings, Designer Brands, Shop', 'mcn_created_on': '1646639753', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660136903', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/mi_swarovski.jpg']}]
description_en:
Since its foundation in 1895, Swarovski is synonymous with craftsmanship, precision and innovation. Its unique know-how has made the company shine as the worldwide cut crystal reference, 
delighting consumers with desirable and sparkling creations. Showing the creativity that lies at the heart of the company, Swarovski’s own brand lines of jewelry, watches and accessories are 
sold through more than 2 200 retail outlets worldwide.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'HARRODS TEA ROOM', 'mcn_body': '

The Harrods Tea Room takes centre stage at the heart of HIA. It offers a wide range of Harrods specialties, including an impressively diverse selection of teas from the Harrods Food Halls, along with popular pastries. 
The Tea Room also features an ice cream parlour with an eclectic variety of local and international flavours.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1656403388', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660136606', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/HarrodsTeamRoom_480x270_0.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'هارودز تي رووم', 'mcn_body': '

تقدم قاعة الشاي هارودز تي رووم (Harrods Tea Room) الموجودة في وسط مطار حمد الدولي مجموعة واسعة من الأطايب التي التي تختص بها هارودز، بما في ذلك مجموعة هارودز فود هولز المتنوعة والمذهلة من الشاي، إلى جانب المعجنات الشهية المفضلة.
كما تضم القاعة صالة للأيس كريم تحتوي على مجموعة منتقاة من أشهى النكهات المحلية والعالمية.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1660136146', 'mcn_modified_on': '1665907592', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/HarrodsTeamRoom_480x270_0.jpg']}]
description_en:
The Harrods Tea Room takes centre stage at the heart of HIA. It offers a wide range of Harrods specialties, including an impressively diverse selection of teas from the Harrods Food Halls, along with popular pastries. 
The Tea Room also features an ice cream parlour with an eclectic variety of local and international flavours.

[{'mcn_title': 'Women’s Fashion Store ', 'mcn_body': '

QDF's new multi-brand fashion store offers the latest sunglasses from eyewear brands such as Cartier, Dior, and Tom Ford and fashion accessories from Longchamp, Aigner, MCM, and Furla. The store is also home to the famous Qatari fashion brand Al Motahajiba, featuring the latest range of stylish abayas.  

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659247850', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660134654', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Women%CE%93%C3%87%C3%96s%20Fashion%20Store%20480x270.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'متجر الأزياء النسائية ', 'mcn_body': '

يقدم متجر السوق الحرة القطرية الجديد للأزياء علامات تجارية متعددة، ويوفر أحدث النظارات الشمسية من كارتييه وديور وتوم فورد، والإكسسوارات العصرية من فيورلا وإم سي إم وإيجنر ولونج شامب. ويضم في تشكيلته كذلك علامة الأزياء القطرية الشهيرة "المتحجبة"، والتي تتضمن أحدث مجموعة من العبايات العصرية الأنيقة.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1659247850', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660134654', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/shop/Women%CE%93%C3%87%C3%96s%20Fashion%20Store%20480x270.jpg']}]

The store is also home to the famous Qatari fashion brand Al Motahajiba, featuring the latest range of stylish abayas.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Cosmos by internationally-acclaimed French Artist Jean-Michel Othoniel', 'mcn_body': '

Othoniel draws inspiration from an artefact located in the collection at the Museum of Islamic Art in Qatar, the oldest surviving Islamic astrolabe in the world. Othoniel created a large and intricate globe installation that symbolizes the path of travellers around the world, using gold to gild the steel structure and emulate warmth and sunlight. When viewed from the side or below, the artwork appears as bright and beautifully-detailed calligraphy drawn in space

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1639382804', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660129111', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Cosmos.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': '"كون" للفنان الفرنسي العالمي جان ميشيل أوثونيل', 'mcn_body': '

يستلهم أوثونيل في تصميمه لهذا العمل الفني، قطعة أثرية تضمها مجموعة متحف الفن الإسلامي في قطر، ألا وهي أقدم أسطرلاب إسلامي باقٍ على وجه الأرض. وقد أبدع أوثونيل تركيبًا كرويًا ضخمًا ومعقدًا يرمز من خلاله إلى مسارات المسافرين حول العالم، مستخدمًا الذهب في تذهيب هيكله الفولاذي ومحاكيًا لدفء الشمس وأشعتها. ويبدو العمل الفني، عند النظر إليه من جانبه أو أسفله، كخطٍّ فنيّ ساطع ورائع التفاصيل تم رسمه في الفضاء.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1663760490', 'mcn_modified_on': '1754397356', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Cosmos.jpg']}]
mcn_title_en: Cosmos by internationally-acclaimed French Artist Jean-Michel Othoniel
description_en: Othoniel draws inspiration from an artefact located in the collection at the Museum of Islamic Art in Qatar, the oldest surviving Islamic astrolabe in the world. Othoniel created a large and intricate globe installation that symbolizes the path of travellers around the world, using gold to gild the steel structure and emulate warmth and sunlight. When viewed from the side or below, the artwork appears as bright and beautifully-detailed calligraphy drawn in space

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Mappemondes by Adel Abdessemed', 'mcn_body': '

In this artwork, Abdessamed creates a world map using old tin cans collected from market places and streets in Dakar. Through this piece, Abdessamed tries to highlight the consequences of the ‘throwaway culture’ of the modern world.
\r\nAbdessamed creates artworks which juxtapose situations or actions carried out on everyday objects.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Mappemondes, Map, Adel Abdessemed, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1639379839', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128993', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Mappemodes%20by%20Adel.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': '"خريطة العالم" للفنان عادل عبدالصمد', 'mcn_body': '

في هذا العمل الفني، يرسم عادل عبد الصمد خريطة للعالم باستخدام علب صفيحٍ قديمة، جُمعت من أسواق وشوارع العاصمة السنغالية داكار. ويسعى عبدالصمد من خلال هذا العمل الفني إلى تسليط الضوء على العواقب الوخيمة لهيمنة "النزعة الاستهلاكية" في العالم الحديث. ويُبدع عبدالصمد أعمالاً فنية تُقارن بين مواقف أو أفعال يومية نمارسها في حياتنا اليومية.  

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Mappemondes, Map, Adel Abdessemed, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1663760409', 'mcn_modified_on': '1754397420', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Mappemodes%20by%20Adel.jpg']}]
description_en:
In this artwork, Abdessamed creates a world map using old tin cans collected from market places and streets in Dakar. Through this piece, Abdessamed tries to highlight the consequences of the ‘throwaway culture’ of the modern world.
Abdessamed creates artworks which juxtapose situations or actions carried out on everyday objects.
meta_tags: Mappemondes, Map, Adel Abdessemed, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Arctic Nurseries of El Dorado by British artist Marc Quinn', 'mcn_body': '

In this enlarged bronze sculpture, a flower hybrid is created using elements taken from different plants. British artist Quinn assumed a distinct interest in flowers as a subject since 2000. Forms of orchids are repeatedly collaged together in his large-scale work, which link back to the artist’s interest in DNA and genetic manipulation.


Although the work is cast in heavy bronze, it is coated with a white pigment, that manages to cultivate an ethereal quality and produces a delicate and fresh effect - comparable to the look of porcelain. The flower is also representational of the nature of culture and economic affairs. It’s a representation of globalization and the potential to fly flowers in from all over the world in a day.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'art, marc quinn, Arctic Nurseries of El Dorado', 'mcn_created_on': '1639375527', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128944', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/The%20Nurseries%20of%20El%20Dorado1_0.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'مشاتل زهور إلدرادو القُطبية ', 'mcn_body': '

في هذا التمثال البرونزي الضخم، نشاهد هجين من الزهور تم إنتاجها عن طريق جمع نباتات مختلفة. أبدى الفنان البريطاني كوين اهتمامًا واضحًا بالزهور كموضوع لأعماله منذ عام 2000. فقد قام بتجميع عدد من أزهار الأوركيد بشكل مكرر ومتناغم في هذا العمل الرائع والذي يعكس تلاعب الفنان بالحمض النووي والجينات.

فالبرغم من أن هذا العمل قد تم صبه في برونز ثقيل، تمت تغطيته بصبغه بيضاء، وهذا ينتج عنه الشعور المرهف والتأثير النقي إذا ما تم مقارنته بالأعمال الخزفية المماثلة. هذه الزهرة تمثل الطبيعة والثقافة والاقتصاد. كما أنها تمثل العولمة واحتمالية طيران الأزهار من مختلف أنحاء العالم في يوم واحد.

 

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'art, marc quinn, Arctic Nurseries of El Dorado', 'mcn_created_on': '1660131290', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660131305', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/The%20Nurseries%20of%20El%20Dorado1_0.jpg']}]
mcn_title_en: Arctic Nurseries of El Dorado by British artist Marc Quinn
description_en:
In this enlarged bronze sculpture, a flower hybrid is created using elements taken from different plants. British artist Quinn assumed a distinct interest in flowers as a subject since 2000. Forms of orchids are repeatedly collaged together in his large-scale work, which link back to the artist’s interest in DNA and genetic manipulation.


Although the work is cast in heavy bronze, it is coated with a white pigment, that manages to cultivate an ethereal quality and produces a delicate and fresh effect - comparable to the look of porcelain. The flower is also representational of the nature of culture and economic affairs. It’s a representation of globalization and the potential to fly flowers in from all over the world in a day.
meta_tags: art, marc quinn, Arctic Nurseries of El Dorado

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Other Worlds by American Sculptor Tom Otterness', 'mcn_body': '

A series of eight interactive bronze sculptures are spread throughout the activity nodes in passenger terminal C at Hamad International Airport. These playgrounds are in three locations at the airport: the first location features the tower figures and two reclining cylinder figures; the second features a sitting cylinder figure and another reclining cylinder figure; and the third location features a sitting cone and sitting sphere facing each other. There are also many small, six inch figures that reflect the international travellers that use the airport, placed on various areas around the larger figures.


For the installation, Tom Otterness worked closely with Polich Tallix Fine Art Foundry in Rock Tavern, New York to cast this series of large-scale bronze figures that appear to be in play with one another. With slides and seats for limbs and play-pen-like chambers for torsos, these figures invite visitors at the airport - both children and adults - to engage, interact and find recreational enjoyment in the sculptures. Tom Otterness is widely known for his public installations both in the United States and abroad.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'The Playground, Tom Otterness, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1639380791', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128852', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Other%20Worls%20By%20Tom%20Otterness.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'عوالم أخرى', 'mcn_body': '

سلسلة مؤلفة من 8 مجسّمات تفاعلية مصنوعة من البرونز وموزّعة على ساحات الأنشطة في مبنى المسافرين رقم 3 في مطار حمد الدولي. وتتوزع المجسّمات على ثلاثة أماكن: يوجد في المكان الأول مجسّم لشخوص، ويأخذ هذا المجسم شكل البرج، إلى جانب مجسّمين أخرين أسطوانيّ الشكل لشخصين متكئين. وفي المكان الثاني، يوجد مجسّم لشخص جالس وآخر متكئ. أما المكان الثالث ففيه مجسمان أحدهما مخروطي الشكل والآخر كروي يتخذان وضعية الجلوس ويقابل كل منهما الآخر. كما توجد العديد من المجسّمات الصغيرة بحجم 6 بوصة على هيئة شخوص ترمز إلى المسافرين الذين يستخدمون المطار من جميع أنحاء العالم. وتنتشر هذه المجسّمات الصغيرة بمحيط المجسّمات الكبيرة.  

 ولصُنع هذا العمل، تعاون الفنان توم أوترنس عن كثب مع مؤسسة بولش تاليك للفنون الجميلة والموجودة في مدينة روك تافيلن بولاية نيويورك لتجميع هذه السلسلة من المجسمات البرونزية كبيرة الحجم التي تبدو على هيئة شخوص تلعب مع بعضها البعض. وتُستخدم هذه المجسمات كزلاجات للأطفال، ومقاعد للجلوس، وغرف للعب على هيئة أجساد بشرية، مما يدعو زوار المطار من الأطفال والكبار على حد سواء لاستخدامها والتفاعل معها بهدف المتعة والترفيه. يحظى توم اوترنس بشهرة واسعة في صناعة المجسّمات التي يتم وضعها في الأماكن العامة داخل الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية وخارجها.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'The Playground, Tom Otterness, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1660131105', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660131145', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Other%20Worls%20By%20Tom%20Otterness.jpg']}]
mcn_title_en: Other Worlds by American Sculptor Tom Otterness
description_en:
A series of eight interactive bronze sculptures are spread throughout the activity nodes in passenger terminal C at Hamad International Airport. These playgrounds are in three locations at the airport: the first location features the tower figures and two reclining cylinder figures; the second features a sitting cylinder figure and another reclining cylinder figure; and the third location features a sitting cone and sitting sphere facing each other. There are also many small, six inch figures that reflect the international travellers that use the airport, placed on various areas around the larger figures.


For the installation, Tom Otterness worked closely with Polich Tallix Fine Art Foundry in Rock Tavern, New York to cast this series of large-scale bronze figures that appear to be in play with one another. With slides and seats for limbs and play-pen-like chambers for torsos, these figures invite visitors at the airport - both children and adults - to engage, interact and find recreational enjoyment in the sculptures. Tom Otterness is widely known for his public installations both in the United States and abroad.
meta_tags: The Playground, Tom Otterness, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax
location: ['C concourse', '1st Floor', 'C concourse', '1st Floor', 'C concourse', '1st Floor']

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'ORYX By Tom Claassen', 'mcn_body': "

Dutch artist Tom Claassen has produced a series of sculptures of the Oryx, an antelope native to the Arabian Peninsula, which appear as a herd in the arrivals hall of the airport. Tom Claassen's work is emphatically versatile, in terms of subject, technique, and choice of material, but always recognisable. All of his sculptures embody a paradoxical tension between the light tone in which he approaches his subject matter, and the rounded, way they are shaped.

\r\n", 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Oryx, Tom Claassen, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1639378094', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128813', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Oryx%20By%20Tom%20Claassen.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': '8 غزلان المها العربية ', 'mcn_body': '

أبدع الفنان الهولندي توم كلاسن سلسلة من مجسّمات غزلان المها العربية المنتمية لشبه الجزيرة العربية. وتبدو هذه الأعمال وكأنها قطيع من الغزلان في مبنى الوصول في المطار. أعمال توم كلاسن متنوعة تنوعًا شديدًا على مستوى الفكرة والتقنية واختيار الأدوات، ولكن يسهُل التعرف عليها دائمًا. فجميع منحوتات هذا الفنان تجسّد التوتر المتناقض بين النبرة الخفيفة التي يتناول من خلالها فكرة موضوعه والأسلوب الشامل الذي تُصاغ به هذه الفكرة.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Oryx, Tom Claassen, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1660131163', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660131176', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Oryx%20By%20Tom%20Claassen.jpg']}]
description_en: Dutch artist Tom Claassen has produced a series of sculptures of the Oryx, an antelope native to the Arabian Peninsula, which appear as a herd in the arrivals hall of the airport. Tom Claassen's work is emphatically versatile, in terms of subject, technique, and choice of material, but always recognisable. All of his sculptures embody a paradoxical tension between the light tone in which he approaches his subject matter, and the rounded, way they are shaped.
meta_tags: Oryx, Tom Claassen, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Desert Horse By Ali Hassan', 'mcn_body': '

Desert Horse captures the spirit of the travel and the flow of movement, just as the Bedouins used horses for travel in the past. Hassan’s artistic technique approaches calligraphy by combining classical techniques with abstraction and a contemporary interpretation that is translated into sculpture.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Desert Horse, Ali Hassan, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1639381519', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128762', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Ali%20Hassan-%20Desert%20Horse%204.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'حصان الصحراء للفنان علي حسن الجابر', 'mcn_body': '

حصان الصحراء للفنان علي حسن الجابر

تُجسّد منحوتة "حصان الصحراء" روح السفر وتدفق الحركة، وهي تستحضر مشهد الخيول التي استخدمها بدو الصحراء في الماضي في حِلِّهم وترحالهم. وقد طوّر الفنان الجابر أسلوبًا فنيًا فريدًا في فن الخط العربي عبر مزجه الأساليب التقليدية بلمسات من التجريد والرؤية المعاصرة التي تتجلى في هذه المنحوتة.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Desert Horse, Ali Hassan, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax', 'mcn_created_on': '1663760445', 'mcn_modified_on': '1754397260', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/Ali%20Hassan-%20Desert%20Horse%204.jpg']}]
description_en: Desert Horse captures the spirit of the travel and the flow of movement, just as the Bedouins used horses for travel in the past. Hassan’s artistic technique approaches calligraphy by combining classical techniques with abstraction and a contemporary interpretation that is translated into sculpture.
meta_tags: Desert Horse, Ali Hassan, Artist, QMA, Qatar Museums Authority, Art, Relax

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Falcon By Tom Claassen', 'mcn_body': '

Claassen has unveiled ‘Falcon’, also known as ‘Saqr’ in Arabic, which is an abstract representation of Qatar’s national bird. Taking inspiration from the falcon’s soft feathers, the vivid outline of the bird mimics the aviation routes from Qatar to the rest of the world. These curves are also derived from Arabic calligraphy and the folds found in the fabric of traditional Qatari attire. The falcon sits on a ledge facing the Departures Hall, exuding royalty with its gold finish.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1660127825', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660128593', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/252x184px.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'منحوتة "صقر" للفنان توم كلاسن', 'mcn_body': '

كشف الفنان توم كلاسن عن العمل الفني "صقر"، ويعتبر الصقر من الطيور التي تحمل قيمة تاريخية ووطنية في دولة قطر. وقد استلهم الفنان خطوط المنحوتة من ريش الصقر بملمسه الناعم، فيما تحاكي الانحناءات البارزة مسارات الطيران التي تنطلق من قطر إلى كافة أنحاء العالم، وكذلك جماليات الخط العربي وطيّات الثوب القطري التقليدي. 

وتقف منحوتة "صقر" شامخة بحلتها الذهبية المميزة على الجهة المقابلة لمبنى المغادرين في مطار حمد الدولي.

', 'mcn_meta_tags': '', 'mcn_created_on': '1663760997', 'mcn_modified_on': '1754397472', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/art/252x184px.jpg']}]
description_en: Claassen has unveiled ‘Falcon’, also known as ‘Saqr’ in Arabic, which is an abstract representation of Qatar’s national bird. Taking inspiration from the falcon’s soft feathers, the vivid outline of the bird mimics the aviation routes from Qatar to the rest of the world. These curves are also derived from Arabic calligraphy and the folds found in the fabric of traditional Qatari attire. The falcon sits on a ledge facing the Departures Hall, exuding royalty with its gold finish.

mcn_content:
[{'mcn_title': 'Le Grand Comptoir ', 'mcn_body': '

 Le Grand Comptoir is a brasserie-style restaurant that is a breakfast venue in the morning and becomes a relaxed evening destination with low lighting and a pianist providing entertainment. Meanwhile, at lunchtime, it has light bistro-style dishes such as a fresh salad Nicoise or other classic French dishes such as a Croque monsieur.  

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Le Grand Comptoir, Food, Drinks, Restaurant, Breakfast, International Cuisine, Salad, Dine', 'mcn_created_on': '1656405144', 'mcn_modified_on': '1659430232', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/mi_legrand_banner.jpg']}, {'mcn_title': 'لو جراند كومتوا', 'mcn_body': '

مطعم لو جراند كومتوا (Le Grand Comptoir) هو مطعم على طراز برازيريه تقليدي ويقدم وجبات الفطور الشهية في الصباح، ليتحول إلى وجهة مسائية هادئة تأسر الضيوف بإضاءتها الخفيفة وأنغام البيانو الساحرة. وفي أوقات الغداء، يقدم المطعم وجبات خفيفة لذيذة مثل سلطة نيسواز الطازجة أو غيرها من الأطباق الفرنسية الكلاسيكية مثل كروك موسيو.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'Le Grand Comptoir, Food, Drinks, Restaurant, Breakfast, International Cuisine, Salad, Dine', 'mcn_created_on': '1660135091', 'mcn_modified_on': '1660135110', 'mcn_language': 'ar', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/dine/mi_legrand_banner.jpg']}]
description_en: Le Grand Comptoir is a brasserie-style restaurant that is a breakfast venue in the morning and becomes a relaxed evening destination with low lighting and a pianist providing entertainment. Meanwhile, at lunchtime, it has light bistro-style dishes such as a fresh salad Nicoise or other classic French dishes such as a Croque monsieur.

[{'mcn_title': 'QAS Excess Baggage Payment', 'mcn_body': '

[{'mcn_title': 'QAS Baggage Services / Lost & Found', 'mcn_body': '

Stationed in the Airside Arrivals baggage reclaim area near Baggage Belt 9. This facility provides baggage assistance to passengers coming from other airlines except Qatar Airways. It includes mishandled baggage services like, delayed baggage, damaged baggage and missing property.

\r\n', 'mcn_meta_tags': 'QAS Baggage Services, Lost and Found, mishandled baggage services, delayed baggage, damaged baggage, missing property, Facility, Facilities', 'mcn_created_on': '1655984996', 'mcn_modified_on': '1655985091', 'mcn_language': 'en', 'mcn_status': '1', 'mcn_header_image': ['https://dohahamadairport.com/sites/default/files/facilities/mi_qaslostandfound_0.png']}, {'mcn_title': 'القطرية لخدمات الطيران QAS- خدمات الأمتعة/ المفقودات', 'mcn_body': '
